programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
programme.desc: Although the once-hot game show Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? had lost its luster as a prime-time ABC offering, the producers felt that there was enough life left in the property to warrant a Monday-through-Friday syndicated version. Taking over from the earlier series' host Regis Philbin was Meredith Vieira of The View. To make certain that the series would not be bankrupted after its first week on the air, the questions posed to contestants were considerably harder than those on the prime-time incarnation. Also, the famous "fastest finger" round was eliminated, taking some of the pressure off the contestants when they struggled to come up with answers. The most noteworthy change from the original version was the absence of Regis Philbin's familiar catchphrases: One would never hear Meredith Vieira chime in with the legendary "Is that your final answer?" The syndicated Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? was launched on September 16, 2002(n)

programme.title: Green Zone
programme.desc: Thriller starring Matt Damon, Greg Kinnear and Jason Isaacs. Director Paul Greengrass fuses his attraction to real-life events with his mastery of full-pelt action to offer this commentary on the Iraq War. US Army officer Roy Miller is thrown into the chaotic vacuum created by Saddam Hussein's removal and the Allies' handling of the immediate aftermath. His mission: to track down those elusive weapons of mass destruction. But, sent on one deadly wild goose chase after another, Miller begins to question the quality of the intelligence directing the operation. Frustrated, he begins to ask awkward questions and is soon being bounced between Poundstone, the Pentagon intelligence officer who insists the WMDs are there to be found, and the CIA's Martin Brown, whose knowledge of the country leads him to a very different conclusion, and Special Forces man Briggs, who appears determined to undermine Miller's efforts. As he digs deeper, Miller begins to piece together the complex relationships and competing ideologies of those around him, as well as the possibility that he has also stumbled upon a political conspiracy..(n)

John was raised to believe in a specific version of the future, but that future begins to shift with the appearance of mysterious former death-row inmate Marcus Wright. programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: Fourteen-year-old Mattie Ross (Hailee Steinfeld) joins an aging U.S. marshal (Jeff Bridges) and another lawman (Matt Damon) in tracking her father's killer into hostile Indian territory in Joel and Ethan Coen's adaptation of Charles Portis' original novel. Sticking more closely to the source material than the 1969 feature adaptation starring Western icon John Wayne, the Coens' True Grit tells the story from the young girl's perspective, and re-teams the celebrated filmmaking duo with their No Country for Old Men producing partner Scott Rudin. Josh Brolin and Barry Pepper co-star(n)

programme.title: Let the Church Say Amen
programme.desc: Academy Award-nominated filmmaker David Peterson directs the documentary Let the Church Say Amen. The World Missions for Christ Church exists inside a small storefront in Washington, D.C. While the city government lacks funds and power, this little church reaches out to make necessary, positive changes in the community. Homelessness, violence, and drug addiction are all faced head-on by the church members, as missionaries seek out those who have been left behind by poverty and injustice. Peterson presents faith as a force of hope and inspiration within a crumbling, neglected city. Let the Church Say Amen premiered the 2003 SilverDocs Documentary Film Festival and screened at the 2004 Sundance Film Festival as part of the American Spectrum competition(n)

programme.title: Woman Thou Art Loosed
programme.desc: One woman's odyssey through a hellish life of sexual abuse, drug addiction, and crime is resolved in faith in this tough but inspiring drama based on a true story documented by evangelist Bishop T.D. Jakes. Michelle Jordan (Kimberly Elise) was raised by a single mother, Cassie (Loretta Devine), who became involved with a cruel and opportunistic man named Reggie (Clifton Powell). Reggie began displaying an inappropriate interest in Michelle when she was only eight, and at 12 he began violating her on a regular basis. Stung by her mother's denials of Reggie's wrongdoings, Michelle ran away from home and ended up on a dead-end road of drug abuse and prostitution, which led to a stretch in prison for murder. While behind bars, Michelle hears of the teachings of Bishop T.D. Jakes and his work with abused women, and writes the noted preacher in hopes of someday meeting him. To her surprise, Jakes (who plays himself) pays her a visit, and as she shares with him the story of her blighted life, she takes the first steps on the road to emotional and spiritual recovery. Jakes arranges for Michelle to have a three-day furlough from prison so she can attend a revival he's hosting in the area; opting to stay in a half-way house rather than see Cassie and Reggie, Michelle reconnects with many of her old friends during her three days of freedom, including former stripper Nicole (Idalis de Leon), childhood friend and hairdresser Twana (Debbi Morgan), and former boyfriend Todd (Michael Boatman)(n)

programme.desc: An aging couple strive to conquer their sexual hang-ups and save their 30-year marriage from going stale by visiting a renowned couple's therapist in this comedy from director David Frankel (The Devil Wears Prada, Marley & Me). After three decades of marriage, Kay (Meryl Streep) and Arnold (Tommy Lee Jones) still love each other deeply. But somewhere along the way, their passion for one another seems to have perished. Upon learning about a relationship therapist (Steve Carell) in Great Hope Springs whose methods have yielded incredible results, Kay pleads with Arnold to sign up for a weeklong session. Little does the committed couple realize that overcoming years of sexual repression will prove to be quite an exhausting challenge(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A World of His Own. The first season Twilight Zone came to a delightful conclusion on July 1, 1960, with this episode, written by Richard Matheson. Coming home early one afternoon, Victoria West (Phyllis Kirk) is shocked to find her playwright husband Gregory West (Keenan Wynn) in the arms of another woman named Mary (Mary LaRoche). When Victoria demands an explanation, Gregory is forced to reveal that Mary was purely a figment of his imagination, "invented" on the writer's tape recorder. To prove this point, Gregory not only makes Mary re-appear, but also a "huge, red-eyed element." But this is not the only surprise in store for the nonplussed Victoria West. The hilarious finale finds series creator Rod Serling joining in on the festivities(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Man in the Bottle. Prosperity proves problematic when a genie grants four wishes to a pawnbroker. Castle: Luther Adler. Genie: Joseph Ruskin. Edna: Vivi Janiss. Mrs. Gumley: Lisa Golm. German Officer: Peter Coe. German Officer # 2: Albert Szabo. Revenue Man: Olan Soule. Rod Serling is the host(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Nervous Man in a $4 Room. Though obviously an episode designed to absorb the costs of the more expensive Twilight Zone installments, this was one of the better efforts of the series' second season, with a tour de force performance by Joe Mantell as penny-ante gangster Jackie Rhoades. Ordered to bump off a rival gangster, the timorous Rhoades tries to summon up the courage for the foul deed, only to be thwarted at every turn by his own conscience -- who as it turns out has more "guts" than Jackie ever dreamed of. Though essentially a solo endeavor, the episode also features a good performance from future producer-director William D. Gordon as Jackie's nasty boss, while another future director, Brian G. Hutton, serves as Joe Mantell's back-to-camera stand-in when the actor "confronts" himself. Written by Rod Serling and scored by Jerry Goldsmith, "Nervous Man in a Four Dollar Room" was the first episode produced for Twilight Zone's second season, even though it was telecast as the third episode, on October 14, 1960(n)

programme.title: Shark Attack 2
programme.desc: Danger stalks the beautiful beaches of Hawaii in this action-packed drama. Dr. Nick West (Thorsten Kaye) is a marine biologist hired to deal with the results of an experiment in genetics -- a mutated breed of great white sharks with an especially fearsome disposition. West soon discovers some of the sharks have gotten loose while being transported to a aquarium and are helping themselves to the windsurfers along a once-quiet Hawaiian shoreline. West teams up with Roy Bishop (Daniel Alexander), a veteran shark fisherman from Australia, to capture the deadly creatures before they can claim any more victims; assisting them is Samatha Sharp (Nikita Ager), a beautiful woman whose sister was killed when one of the mutant sharks attacked them while swimming. This sequel to Shark Attack received its United States debut on the USA cable network(n)

programme.title: Jennifer's Body
programme.desc: (2009) Megan Fox stars in director Karyn Kusama's (Girl Fight, Aeon Flux) horror satire, from a script by Juno writer Diablo Cody. Student Jennifer Check (Fox) is the stereotypical cheerleader: beautiful, bitchy and adored by all (other than those who are on the receiving end of her cruel wit) at her school in Devil's Kettle. However, local indie band Low Shoulder are more interested in her body than everyone else. In a bid to further their careers, they've made a pact with the Devil: one that requires the soul of a virgin. They kidnap and kill Jennifer, but unfortunately she was no virgin - and she rises again, as a literal man-eater, to take terrible retribution by ravenously rampaging her way through the school. Only one person stands a chance of halting the carnage: Jennifer's best friend Anita 'Needy' Lesnicky (Amanda Seyfried), who's nerdy, for sure, but also may have the strength of character to succeed where others have been ingested..(n)

This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Life is a Carnival
programme.desc: Meet the loyal crew of the Staton-House Band, a makeshift family of roadies and passionate music lovers. Led by tour manager Bill Hanson and production manager Shelli Anderson, this committed group of roadies works tirelessly to make the show happen every night. But all of their lives are about to change with the sudden arrival of Reg Whitehead, a slick British financial advisor hired to overhaul the tour's finances. Series premiere(n)

programme.title: What Would Phil Do?
programme.desc: An endless array of crises land on Bill after the band has a disastrous show. Kelly Ann is not welcomed back in the way that she hoped. And Reg, needing to fire a crew member, attempts to educate himself on the nature of their jobs(n)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Brief Nudity

programme.title: The Bryce Newman Letter
programme.desc: A notorious music blogger sets his sights on the band, penning a post that eviscerates them as dull and irrelevant. When Reg invites him to the band's next show to smooth things over, the crew takes matters into their own hands(n)

programme.title: The City Whose Name Must Not Be Spoken
programme.desc: The crew finds themselves the victims of a mythical rock and roll curse, and spends their day off completing odd and very specific tasks needed to break it. Meanwhile, Bill and Shelli search for the band's hard-living bassist(n)

programme.title: Friends and Family
programme.desc: In the band's hometown of Denver, a throng of needy friends and family descend upon the crew, including band member Christopher House's infamous ex-girlfriend, who must be kept away from him at all costs(n)

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus
programme.desc: In this stylized Spike Lee thriller, a man cursed by a mysterious ancient African artifact is overwhelmed by a newfound thirst for blood, which leads him into a dangerous romance that calls into question the very nature of love, addiction, sex and status

programme.title: Bloodworx
programme.desc: When two college friends sign up for a pharmaceutical test to make some quick cash, they find themselves in a remote hospital facility in the grips of a deadly government experiment

programme.title: Dark Hearts
programme.desc: When a struggling artist finds his muse in a sultry singer at an underground nightclub, their daring romance spirals out of control into a dangerous game of deception and betrayal

programme.title: Heartless
programme.desc: In this chilling supernatural tale, a talented young photographer with a disfiguring birthmark discovers a world of reptilian monsters posing as street gangs on the streets of London, who inflict violence on the innocent and offer him everything he's ever dreamed of, but at a deadly price

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: Danny Glover stars as a brilliant mathematician who returns to his family home after 30 years away to discover that tragic events from his past may be in danger of repeating themselves. Plagued by déjà vu, he is convinced his young neighbor and her mother are doomed to die on the anniversary of his wife and daughter's deaths. Struggling to unlock the pattern, he tries to convince his brother-in-law, a policeman, of the impending tragedy, but the facts don't add up. Is he losing his mind, or running out of time?

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: Frequencies
programme.desc: In this futuristic tale where human frequencies determine luck, love, and destiny, a young college student must overcome science in order to love a woman who emits a different frequency than his own

programme.title: Jamie Marks Is Dead
programme.desc: Despite warnings to the contrary, a high-school student befriends the ghost of a misfit classmate who may have been murdered, and becomes torn between the world of the living and the dead. Stars Liv Tyler

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: When a group of friends on a camping trip have an accident on a desolate country road, they unwittingly unleash a bloodcurdling force of nature

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: A dark thriller about a group of young adults who wake up on a deserted tropical island to find they are being hunted down in a sinister plot to harvest their organs. Stars Edward Furlong and Daryl Hannah

programme.title: The Death of "Superman Lives": What Happened?
programme.desc: A documentary that delves into the almost making of Hollywood movie "Superman Lives". In 1996, Warner Brothers hired director Tim Burton to assemble an elite group of artists, including Nicolas Cage as the titular hero, and what follows is "never quite made it" movie history(c)

programme.title: Jamie Marks Is Dead
programme.desc: Despite warnings to the contrary, a high-school student befriends the ghost of a misfit classmate who may have been murdered, and becomes torn between the world of the living and the dead. Stars Liv Tyler

programme.title: Girl House
programme.desc: In an attempt to make some extra cash while away at college, a woman moves into a house that streams content to an X-rated website. After a deranged fan hacks the house's location, she finds herself in a terrifying fight for her life(n)

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there¿s another side to her psychosis(n)

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: When a group of friends on a camping trip have an accident on a desolate country road, they unwittingly unleash a bloodcurdling force of nature(n)

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: A dark thriller about a group of young adults who wake up on a deserted tropical island to find they are being hunted down in a sinister plot to harvest their organs. Stars Edward Furlong and Daryl Hannah(n)

programme.title: Why Horror?
programme.desc: Documentary following horror fan Tal Zimerman as he travels around the world to understand why people thrive on blood and gore, and meets with the genre's leading filmmakers, writers, actors and psychologists to discover how horror is portrayed in different cultures(n)

programme.title: Space Warriors
programme.desc: A young whiz kid's dreams comes true when he gets an invitation to space camp, where he gets a chance to compete with other brainiacs but the contest takes a turn when he must use his smarts to deal with a real-life disaster. Stars Mira Sorvino and Danny Glover(n)

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Gordo
programme.desc: An ambitious young Mexican father leaves behind his popular taco stand for a chance to start his own restaurant in the United States(n)

programme.title: Dreamscape
programme.desc: In this visually awe-inspiring sci-fi adventure, a psychic (Dennis Quaid) who uses his ESP abilities only for financial gain is hired to project himself into the dreams of scientific subjects as part of a groundbreaking clinical study. When he discovers a plot to assassinate the president of the United States, however, he must put aside his mercenary nature to literally save the world(n)

programme.title: Don't Blink
programme.desc: A gripping suspense thriller about a group of friends who arrive at a secluded mountain resort to find it completely deserted. With no gas for the return trip, they are forced to stay and investigate the mystery surrounding the abandoned lodge. Stars Mena Suvari(n)

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends(n)

programme.title: Nightlight
programme.desc: Five teens journey into a mysterious forest for an evening of flashlight games and ghost stories but their plans go awry when they awaken a demonic presence that seizes upon their deepest fears(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Cate Blanchett is a small-town psychic named Annie, a widow using her clairvoyance to support herself and her sons. When she has visions involving the death of a local party girl (Katie Holmes), she suspects Donnie (Keanu Reeves), a violent wife beater. Sure enough, the victim's body is recovered in Donnie's pond, but is Annie interpreting her visions correctly, or is a killer still on the loose?(n)

programme.title: Reeker
programme.desc: A group of disparate strangers including a blind genius and a druggie who ripped off his ecstasy dealer converges on a small, abandoned town where they are promptly slaughtered one at a time by a grotesque and extremely foul-smelling creature. Devon Gummersall, Derek Richardson and Tina Illman star in this tongue-in-cheek horror flick(n)

programme.title: The Abandoned
programme.desc: This eerie, artful horror phantasm stars Anastasia Hille as a film producer who unexpectedly receives a farmhouse inheritance in her native Russia - a mysterious, island-bound structure that houses many ghostly secrets about her unknown past. Karel Roden costars in this effective, chilling genre picture cowritten and directed by Nacho Cerda(n)

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Haunting futuristic tale about a young man living in a colorless, bland utopia, who meets the Giver, an older man who keeps the memories of the past, and opens his eyes to see the dangerous truth about the world he is living in. Stars Meryl Streep, Jeff Bridges and Katie Holmes(n)

programme.title: Nas: Time Is Illmatic
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the making of Nas' 1994 groundbreaking debut album Illmatic that follows the artist as he returns to his childhood home to share stories of his upbringing and influences and tracks the thrilling evolution from his life as a young street poet to a visionary MC. Features interviews with his musical peers, including Pharrell Williams and Alicia Keys and the "Illmatic" producers

programme.title: Stretch and Bobbito: Radio That Changed Lives
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of two quirky friends who became unlikely legends by hosting a radio show that introduced the world to the biggest hip-hop artists of the 90s, including Nas, Biggie, Wu-Tang, Jay-Z, Eminem and the Fugees. Includes interviews with the rap world's luminaries

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: As a church camp group prepares for a devout spring break vacation, a demonic logger rises from his sap boiler to wreak vengeance and feast on flapjacks soaked in the blood of his victims

programme.title: Anarchy Parlor
programme.desc: Horror about a mysterious nomad who works at a Lithuanian tattoo parlor where he practices a dark art form passed down through the generations, giving the visiting tourists much more than they bargained for

programme.title: Boulevard
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars as a married man whose long-suppressed sexual identity slowly emerges when he picks up a male hooker and pays him for companionship rather than sex, causing his life of predictable normalcy to unravel

programme.title: The Next Hit
programme.desc: A mystery suspense thriller about a record company that takes an unorthodox approach to boosting sales by putting a 'hit' on their marquee talent's life with hopes of creating a multi-platinum recording legend

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Anderson, this offbeat comedy is the story of an extraordinary family's sudden and unexpected reunion, as the three former genius children and their inimitable mother and father try to reconcile after decades of betrayal, failure and disaster. Features an all-star cast, including Gene Hackman, Anjelica Huston, Ben Stiller, Gwyneth Paltrow and Luke Wilson

programme.title: The Roost
programme.desc: Four friends en route to a wedding on Halloween night suffer an automotive mishap that lands them squarely in the lair of zombie-creating vampire bats, while a creepy "horror host" (Tom Noonan) occasionally interrupts the action to comment on this exquisite slice of B-movie hokum. Real-life siblings Wil and Vanessa Horneff costar with Karl Jacob, Sean Reid and genre guru Larry Fessenden, who turns in a cameo

programme.title: Conan O'Brien / Jeffrey Tambor
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Conan O'Brien and Jeffrey Tambor(c)

programme.title: Greetings from Tim Buckley
programme.desc: Penn Badgley stars as the musician Jeff Buckley, who is struggling with the legacy of his late folk singer father's legacy, in the days leading up to his 1991 tribute concert and he finds solace with an enigmatic young woman, before the now-legendary show that launched his own brilliant career. Also stars Imogen Poots

programme.title: Mistaken for Strangers
programme.desc: A poignant and funny documentary that follows The National on tour, created by the frontman's younger brother, who was hired as a roadie but instead decides to set up camera and chronicle the journey, revealing sibling tension, his own self sabotage and the highs and lows of rock 'n' roll life

programme.title: Perfect Sisters
programme.desc: A pair of abused and neglected teenage girls are driven to an unthinkable crime when their mother's alcoholism and her string of abusive boyfriends leaves them no other choice. Stars Abigail Breslin and Mira Sorvino

programme.title: INXS: Never Tear Us Apart - Part 1
programme.desc: How six suburban boys in a band from Australia conquered the world with a unique sound and a work ethic that became legendary. This two-part drama charts the rise of INXS from the Sydney pub rock scene of the early 1980s to the pinnacle of the music industry to the tragedy that brought it all to a crashing halt. Featuring a stellar cast and unprecedented access to an archive of music, it's the ultimate rock-'n'-roll story of mateship, conflict, success and excess

programme.title: INXS: Never Tear Us Apart - Part 2
programme.desc: How six suburban boys in a band from Australia conquered the world with a unique sound and a work ethic that became legendary. This two-part drama charts the rise of INXS from the Sydney pub rock scene of the early 1980s to the pinnacle of the music industry to the tragedy that brought it all to a crashing halt. Featuring a stellar cast and unprecedented access to an archive of music, it's the ultimate rock-'n'-roll story of mateship, conflict, success and excess

programme.title: Conan O'Brien / Jeffrey Tambor
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Conan O'Brien and Jeffrey Tambor(c)

programme.title: Key & Peele / Garry Marshall
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Keegan-Michael Key & Jordan Peele and Garry Marshall(c)

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think

programme.title: Brad Williams: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: In this hilarious new comedy special, stand-up Brad Williams tackles race and political correctness, as well as how his father raised him to deal with adversity(n)

programme.title: Alec Mapa: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Actor and comedian Alec Mapa's heartfelt and hilarious film of his one-man show exploring the challenges of adopting a five-year-old foster child with his husband. Includes behind-the-scenes footage of his family's home life on a busy show day(n)

programme.title: A Glimpse Inside the Mind of Charles Swan III
programme.desc: Set in stylized Los Angeles, Charlie Sheen stars in this quirky comedy as a successful graphic designer whose fame, money and charm have provided him with a seemingly perfect life but when his true love breaks off their relationship, his world spirals into doubt, confusion and fantasy. Also stars Bill Murray, Patricia Arquette and Jason Schwartzman(n)

programme.title: Perfect Sisters
programme.desc: A pair of abused and neglected teenage girls are driven to an unthinkable crime when their mother's alcoholism and her string of abusive boyfriends leaves them no other choice. Stars Abigail Breslin and Mira Sorvino(n)

programme.title: NYC Underground
programme.desc: When a group of friends make the trek across town to a Brooklyn concert, they become embroiled in a drug deal that goes awry, leaving them to flee through New York City's labyrinthine subway system in a race of life or death(n)

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think(n)

programme.title: A Glimpse Inside the Mind of Charles Swan III
programme.desc: Set in stylized Los Angeles, Charlie Sheen stars in this quirky comedy as a successful graphic designer whose fame, money and charm have provided him with a seemingly perfect life but when his true love breaks off their relationship, his world spirals into doubt, confusion and fantasy. Also stars Bill Murray, Patricia Arquette and Jason Schwartzman(n)

programme.title: Greetings from Tim Buckley
programme.desc: Penn Badgley stars as the musician Jeff Buckley, who is struggling with the legacy of his late folk singer father's legacy, in the days leading up to his 1991 tribute concert and he finds solace with an enigmatic young woman, before the now-legendary show that launched his own brilliant career. Also stars Imogen Poots(n)

programme.title: Just Let Go - Lenny Kravitz Live
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling a six-month Lenny Kravitz tour from Paris to New York and beyond, which examines the crucial relationship between him and his illustrious band. On rooftops, in muscle cars, propped up in dive bars, and in pool halls, the band talk candidly about life on the road, sharing the stage, improvising, translating the music from the studio and Lenny Kravitz's quest for perfection(n)

programme.title: What If
programme.desc: Comedy starring Daniel Radcliffe as a med school dropout who can't keep his love life in order or keep it separate from a new friendship with a woman who, inconveniently, has a boyfriend. Also stars Zoe Kazan and Adam Driver(n)

programme.title: The Way Of The Gun
programme.desc: From the screenwriter of "The Usual Suspects" comes this action-packed thriller starring Ryan Phillippe and Benicio del Toro as kidnappers angling for a big payday by snatching a pregnant woman (Juliette Lewis) who's carrying a wealthy couple's surrogate child. Unfortunately, a Mafia lawyer (James Caan) and his assassins (Taye Diggs and Nicky Katt) are taking the situation very personally, leading to a bloody desert confrontation where hidden truths are revealed(n)

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: When a group of friends on a camping trip have an accident on a desolate country road, they unwittingly unleash a bloodcurdling force of nature(n)

programme.title: 21 Years: Richard Linklater
programme.desc: Documentary that takes a behind the scenes tour of groundbreaking director Richard Linklater's last 21 years creating his iconic legacy of films from the unconventional breakout 'Slacker' to the innovative 'Boyhood'. Features candid conversations with actors Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Matthew McConaughey and others(n)

programme.title: Spark: A Burning Man Story
programme.desc: A compelling behind-the-scenes look into the cultural phenomenon of Burning Man. Filmmakers Steve Brown and Jessie Deeter embed themselves with the cofounders, staff and a select group of artists and attendees to create an inside look at this magical happening and its ongoing evolution, the people who make it a reality, and the unique effect it has on all those who attend(n)

programme.title: StreetDance 2
programme.desc: After suffering humiliation by a rival crew, a street dancer gathers the best dancers from around the world for a rematch(n)

programme.title: The Way Of The Gun
programme.desc: From the screenwriter of "The Usual Suspects" comes this action-packed thriller starring Ryan Phillippe and Benicio del Toro as kidnappers angling for a big payday by snatching a pregnant woman (Juliette Lewis) who's carrying a wealthy couple's surrogate child. Unfortunately, a Mafia lawyer (James Caan) and his assassins (Taye Diggs and Nicky Katt) are taking the situation very personally, leading to a bloody desert confrontation where hidden truths are revealed(n)

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Documentary about the late, great mash-up pioneer DJ AM that charts his meteoric rise, his long-running struggle with addiction, his tabloid romances and his untimely death. Includes live sets, plus interviews with Jon Favreau, Mark Ronson, Mix Master Mike, Samantha Ronson and many others

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas

programme.title: An Erotic Tale of Ms. Dracula
programme.desc: An investigation at Ms. Dracula's mansion into the disappearance of a local beauty leads a group of characters, pulled from the pages of vampire fiction, on a wild goose chase that results in numerous hijinks and the discovery of new erotic secrets

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by the iconic Tim Burton, this tale is based on the outrageous true story of one of the most epic art frauds in history, which stars Amy Adams as an artist who creates enigmatic paintings of waifs with big eyes, which are appropriated by her husband as his own work, catapulting him to unearned fame

programme.title: Arachnophobia
programme.desc: When a small, sleepy California town is overrun by killer spiders, who'll save the day? Will it be nice guy Doctor Ross Jennings (Jeff Daniels)? How about noted entomologist James Atherton (Julian Sands)? Then again, maybe the town's best hope lies in big, bad Delbert McClintock (John Goodman), the "Rambo" of pest controllers. A blend of laughs and chills, this self-styled "thrill-omedy" is the directorial debut of producer Frank Marshall. Harley Jane Kozak and Stuart Pankin costar

programme.title: Arctic Tale
programme.desc: The producers of "March of the Penguins" and "An Inconvenient Truth" team up to present this dazzling documentary that chronicles the endangered life cycles of a walrus and a polar bear, whose frozen habitats are rapidly disappearing thanks to global warming

programme.title: Peaceful Warrior
programme.desc: Adaptation of the New Age memoir about the life-altering philosophical relationship between a talented but arrogant young gymnast and a worldly and mystic gas station attendant named Socrates. Nick Nolte stars

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: Classic tale of the comic misadventures of a young Peruvian bear who travels to London in search of a home and finds himself lost and alone in Paddington Station until he meets a family who takes him in. It looks as though his luck has changed until he catches the eye of a sinister museum taxidermist, who has an old score to settle. Features Sally Hawkins, Hugh Bonneville, Nicole Kidman and the voice of Ben Whishaw

programme.title: Dr. T & The Women
programme.desc: Director Robert Altman's ("Gosford Park") comic portrait of a Dallas gynecologist nicknamed Dr. T (Richard Gere), whose career couldn't be better while his personal life falls apart. When his beloved wife (Farrah Fawcett) is hospitalized with a hopeless mental breakdown, Dr. T finds solace in the arms of a golf pro (Helen Hunt) while his cheerleader daughter (Kate Hudson) grapples with her own romantic problem: she's soon to be married but in love with another woman (Liv Tyler). Janine Turner, Tara Reid, Shelley Long and Laura Dern costar

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute

programme.title: Man of the Year
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars as wise-guy who has made a career out of skewering politicians on his talk shows until he comes up with the ultimate joke: to run for president himself and in the process, ignites a grassroots movement that could change America. Co-stars Laura Linney, Christopher Walken, Jeff Goldblum, and Lewis Black

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: Classic tale of the comic misadventures of a young Peruvian bear who travels to London in search of a home and finds himself lost and alone in Paddington Station until he meets a family who takes him in. It looks as though his luck has changed until he catches the eye of a sinister museum taxidermist, who has an old score to settle. Features Sally Hawkins, Hugh Bonneville, Nicole Kidman and the voice of Ben Whishaw

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx stars as the American legend Ray Charles in this musical drama that is an unflinching portrait of the soulful singer's battle to overcome addiction, fight segregation and revolutionize the music as he transformed into one of the country's most beloved performers. Also stars Kerry Washington(n)

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: Four black-suited, sunglasses-sporting criminals try to determine which of them is a rat or cop after a bank heist goes violently awry, in this stylish crime thriller that cleverly jumps around in time and features the witty, ironic dialogue and unexpected plot twists that would soon become the pop film culture hallmarks of first-time writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth and Steve Buscemi star in this instant classic(n)

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: Ewan McGregor stars in this by-turns shocking and hilarious comedy-drama about heroin addicted Scots, the sophomore feature of filmmaker Danny Boyle ("Shallow Grave"). He's Mark Renton, a junkie who loves his drug of choice and the exciting lifestyle it requires. Still, Mark knows his future's not very bright, so he kicks the habit and gets a real job, but his buddies Sick Boy (Jonny Lee Miller), Spud (Ewen Bremner) and Begbie (Robert Carlyle) drag him reluctantly back into his old ways. Based on the novel by Irvine Welsh(n)

programme.title: Cyborg 2
programme.desc: Beautiful but deadly, a genetically engineered cyborg constructed to seduce and then murder a rival technology company's CEO betrays her programming by falling in love with one of her trainers and escaping the confines of the laboratory where she was created. Angelina Jolie stars in this sci-fi action thriller with Elias Koteas, Jack Palance and Billy Drago(n)

programme.title: Meru
programme.desc: In the high-stakes game of big-wall climbing, the Shark's Fin on Mount Meru may be the ultimate prize. In this documentary three close friends - who are among the world's best professional climbers - battle their complicated pasts, inner demons and nature's harshest elements in an attempt to confront what is arguably the most technically complicated and dangerous peak in the Himalayas - one that has never been scaled to completion(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as an art forger who arranges an early release from prison so he can spend time with his dying son but is then forced to pull off one final audacious heist. Also stars Christopher Plummer(n)

programme.title: Freedom Writers
programme.desc: Hilary Swank stars in this drama about an idealistic California teacher who assigns her at-risk students in a gang-infested high school to writer journals that chronicle their troubled lives. Patrick Dempsey, Imelda Staunton and Scott Glenn costar(n)

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: A quirky comedy starring Bill Murray as a hedonistic war veteran, with a penchant for alcohol and gambling, who is entrusted with babysitting the 12-year-old boy next door. As the improbable pair develops a friendship both of them learn to grow up, in unexpected ways. Also stars Melissa McCarthy and Naomi Watts(n)

programme.title: The Drew
programme.desc: The incredible story of the unlikely rise of The Drew League from humble beginnings in the crime and gang infested streets of South Central Los Angeles to the nation's foremost pro-am basketball league. Crossing racial, cultural and socioeconomic barriers, The Drew celebrates the value of basketball, persistence, loyalty and above all, community. Featuring NBA stars Kevin Durant, DeMar DeRozan, Brandon Jennings and Baron Davis(n)

programme.title: Hidalgo
programme.desc: Based on the true story of the greatest long-distance horse race ever run, this epic action-adventure set in 1890 follows a down-and-out cowboy who travels to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross-desert horse race. Stars Viggo Mortensen and Omar Sharif(n)

programme.title: Pound of Flesh
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars as a former black ops agent who has traveled to South Asia to donate a kidney to his dying niece but wakes to find that he is the latest victim of organ theft, forcing him to carve a blood soaked path through the darkest corners of the city to find the culprits, in a race against the clock(n)

programme.title: The D Train
programme.desc: The dorky head of a high school reunion committee (Jack Black) travels to Los Angeles to track down the most popular guy from his graduating class and convince him to go to the reunion, in an obsessive pursuit of approval and recognition that takes over his life. Also stars Kathryn Hahn and Jeffrey Tambor(n)

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart stars as a young woman who joins the military to escape her small town roots but ends up as a rookie guard at Guantanamo Bay where she strikes up an unusual and life changing friendship with one of the detainees(n)

programme.title: Get Even Before Leavin'
programme.desc: With the Russian mob threatening his family, Ray finds himself on a road trip with Mickey to Primm, in hopes of recovering money stolen from a local casino owner. Bunchy and Bridget take turns looking after baby Maria when Teresa withdraws to her family's house. And Terry gains confidence as a trainer

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Violence, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Chavez vs. Taylor II
programme.desc: In celebration of its 30th anniversary, SHOWTIME CHAMPIONSHIP BOXING presents Julio Cesar Chavez reaching deep into his warrior mentality in a rematch against Meldrick Taylor that proved why he was Mexico's greatest of all time

programme.title: Chavez vs. Randall II
programme.desc: In celebration of its 30th anniversary, SHOWTIME CHAMPIONSHIP BOXING presents Julio Cesar Chavez aiming to avenge his first loss in 90 bouts with a rematch against Frankie Randall that many observers declared too close to call

programme.title: Best of Showtime Boxing 2015
programme.desc: Hard-hitting retrospective of highlights from 2015's biggest knockouts and most exciting fights. Featuring Mayweather, Wilder, Broner, Chavez, Jacobs, Brook and more in huge bouts and emotional moments both in and out of the ring

programme.title: Drunk Stoned Brilliant Dead: The Story of the National Lampoon
programme.desc: Documentary reliving National Lampoon's meteoric rise from the go-to humor magazine of the counterculture to a brand that launched Hollywood's biggest comedies, featuring unseen archival footage, beautiful and shocking art, interviews with the magazine's best-known artists and writers and commentary from Judd Apatow, John Goodman, Billy Bob Thornton, Christopher Buckley and Chevy Chase

programme.title: Danny Roane: First Time Director
programme.desc: A bittersweet mockumentary about a director who is struggling with alcoholism while making his first feature film, and despite the escalating insanity as he careens from sober to hard drinking, he is determined, come hell or high water, to finish the movie

programme.title: 11 Blocks
programme.desc: Martial arts thriller about a man whose wife is held hostage by a corrupt police chief and a hired assassin, forcing him to do the impossible: traverse 11 gang-controlled city blocks to save her life

programme.title: Knuckleball!
programme.desc: This story of a few good men follows Tim Wakefield and Mets pitcher RA Dickey through the 2011 Major League baseball season as they face struggles unique to the knuckleballer alone. Though scoffed at by peers, discouraged by managers, and overlooked by scouts, these men personify the act of defying conventional wisdom. The knuckler is the everyman of baseball, and in them we see the best versions of ourselves, competing in spite of their failures

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When a small town amateur hockey team accepts a challenge to play against the New York Rangers, the entire population must put their petty differences aside and pull together as their small town becomes the center of a nationally televised event. Features an all-star cast, including Russel Crowe, Hank Azaria and Burt Reynolds

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: In a world where clone soldiers from three military tribes are locked in a perpetual battle of air, land and technology, one clone is separated from the battle and finds herself on a quest for the truth with an unlikely trio

programme.title: Need For Speed
programme.desc: Aaron Paul stars as a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate. Now, fresh from prison, he gets his hands on the fastest car around and joins a secretive and extremely high stakes race with revenge in mind, in this story of love, redemption and super fast cars

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Remake of the classic blaxploitation action flick starring Samuel L. Jackson as John Shaft, a New York cop seeking a murder witness (Toni Collette) who can finger a spoiled construction business heir (Christian Bale) for the racially motivated murder of a black student. In the meantime, the wealthy killer has enlisted the aid of a drug dealer (Jeffrey Wright) who wants to move into big league narcotics trafficking. Vanessa L. Williams and Busta Rhymes costar

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: After a lifetime of training in swordsmanship and hand-to-hand combat, the world's most dangerous fighter flees his homeland to start a new life in the American west. But soon the hunter becomes the hunted, and the legendary warrior must wage a fierce, all-out battle against a renegade gang of outlaws and a pack of murderous assassins from his past. Stars Kate Bosworth and Academy Award® winner Geoffrey Rush

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: Set in a future where a failed climate-change experiment kills all life on the planet, a lucky few board a train that endlessly circles the icy globe but with a cruel and dangerous class hierarchy separating the front from the back passengers, a rebel hero stirs up a riot to challenge the system. Features an all-star cast, including Tilda Swinton, Octavia Spencer, Chris Evans and John Hurt

programme.title: Need For Speed
programme.desc: Aaron Paul stars as a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate. Now, fresh from prison, he gets his hands on the fastest car around and joins a secretive and extremely high stakes race with revenge in mind, in this story of love, redemption and super fast cars

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Showtime Boxing International: Frampton vs. Quigg (R)
programme.desc: Undefeated super bantamweight world champions Carl Frampton and Scott Quigg face their toughest test to date in a head to head world title unification showdown. Live from England's Manchester Arena. REPLAY(n)

programme.title: SCB: Santa Cruz vs. Martinez
programme.desc: In anticipation of the July 30 showdown between super featherweight champion Leo Santa Cruz and undefeated Irishman Carl Frampton, relive this classic match-up between Santa Cruz and former world champion Kiko Martinez(n)

programme.title: Santa Cruz vs Terrazas
programme.desc: In anticipation of the September 13, 2014 pay per view rematch between boxing superstars Floyd Mayweather and Marcos Maidana - and featuring Leo Santa Cruz - relive this classic match between Santa Cruz and Victor Terrazas(n)

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Remake of the classic blaxploitation action flick starring Samuel L. Jackson as John Shaft, a New York cop seeking a murder witness (Toni Collette) who can finger a spoiled construction business heir (Christian Bale) for the racially motivated murder of a black student. In the meantime, the wealthy killer has enlisted the aid of a drug dealer (Jeffrey Wright) who wants to move into big league narcotics trafficking. Vanessa L. Williams and Busta Rhymes costar(n)

programme.title: The Alamo (2004)
programme.desc: Academy Awards® winners Billy Bob Thornton and Dennis Quaid star in this historical epic set in 19th century Texas during the famed siege of Alamo, where a group of men led by Colonel Travis, along with Davey Crockett and Jim Bowie, fought against the odds, for the independence of Texas(n)

programme.title: Wild Bill
programme.desc: Infamous lawman and gunman of the Old West, Wild Bill Hickok tries to run from his past and his reputation, as he faces his final showdown in Deadwood. Stars Jeff Bridges, Ellen Barkin, John Hurt, Diane Lane, David Arquette and Christina Applegate(n)

programme.title: The Way Of The Gun
programme.desc: From the screenwriter of "The Usual Suspects" comes this action-packed thriller starring Ryan Phillippe and Benicio del Toro as kidnappers angling for a big payday by snatching a pregnant woman (Juliette Lewis) who's carrying a wealthy couple's surrogate child. Unfortunately, a Mafia lawyer (James Caan) and his assassins (Taye Diggs and Nicky Katt) are taking the situation very personally, leading to a bloody desert confrontation where hidden truths are revealed(n)

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Clive Owen star in this sword-clashing adventure of a fallen warrior who rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master(n)

programme.title: Atari: Game Over
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the rise, fall and burial of the Atari Corporation told through the lens of the filmmakers unearthing hundred of thousands of unsold "E.T." game cartridges that were buried in a small town of New Mexico(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is back for more fast-paced action in this high-intensity sequel from director John Woo ("Face/Off"). Cruise is Ethan Hunt, a talented government agent ordered to bring down Sean Ambrose (Dougray Scott), a rogue fellow spy who plans to auction a stolen, deadly virus to the highest bidder. The bait? Ambrose's former lover Nyah (Thandie Newton), whose beauty and charm are not lost on Ethan. Anthony Hopkins, Ving Rhames, Rade Serbedzija and Brendan Gleeson costar in this hit thriller(n)

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: This Academy Award® winning classic masterfully unravels from an LA interrogation room where the police are questioning a conman in order to solve the case of a multimillion-dollar heist gone wrong that involved himself and four other criminals under the thrall of a mythic crime lord. Stars Kevin Spacey, Stephen Baldwin, Gabriel Byrne and Pete Postelthwaite(n)

programme.title: Chavez vs. Camacho
programme.desc: In celebration of its 30th anniversary, SHOWTIME CHAMPIONSHIP BOXING presents Mexico's favorite son and pound for pound champion Julio Cesar Chavez putting his perfect 81-0 record on the line against Puerto Rican star Hector Camacho(n)

programme.title: Chavez vs. Whitaker
programme.desc: In celebration of its 30th anniversary, SHOWTIME CHAMPIONSHIP BOXING presents two warriors battling back and forth for 12 rounds in a seesaw fight: Mexican legend Julio Cesar Chavez and US Olympic gold medalist Pernell Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Chavez vs. Randall II
programme.desc: In celebration of its 30th anniversary, SHOWTIME CHAMPIONSHIP BOXING presents Julio Cesar Chavez aiming to avenge his first loss in 90 bouts with a rematch against Frankie Randall that many observers declared too close to call(n)

programme.title: Chavez vs. Taylor II
programme.desc: In celebration of its 30th anniversary, SHOWTIME CHAMPIONSHIP BOXING presents Julio Cesar Chavez reaching deep into his warrior mentality in a rematch against Meldrick Taylor that proved why he was Mexico's greatest of all time(n)

programme.title: Best of Showtime Boxing 2015
programme.desc: Hard-hitting retrospective of highlights from 2015's biggest knockouts and most exciting fights. Featuring Mayweather, Wilder, Broner, Chavez, Jacobs, Brook and more in huge bouts and emotional moments both in and out of the ring(n)

programme.title: Showtime Boxing on SHO Extreme: Malignaggi vs. Bracero
programme.desc: Welterweights Paulie "Magic Man" Malignaggi (35-7, 7 KOs) and Gabriel "Tito" Bracero (24-2, 5 KOs) in an all-Brooklyn brawl. Plus, lightweight Ivan Redkach (19-1-1, 15 KOs) vs. Tevin Farmer (24-1-1, 5 KOs). Live from Barclays Center(n)

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Terrence Howard stars in this rousing true-life story of a Philadelphia swim coach in the mid-1970s who faces racism in trying to land a coaching position, and instead transforms a group of trash-talking inner-city teenagers into a championship squad. Bernie Mac, Kimberly Elise and Tom Arnold costar in this inspiring drama

programme.title: Dragon: Bruce Lee Story
programme.desc: Based on the life and career of Martial Arts superstar Bruce Lee, this biographical drama chronicles his early training in Hong Kong where an altercation led him to flee to the US where he opened a Martial Arts school and landed a big time movie career, all the while running from the demons of his past

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Haunting futuristic tale about a young man living in a colorless, bland utopia, who meets the Giver, an older man who keeps the memories of the past, and opens his eyes to see the dangerous truth about the world he is living in. Stars Meryl Streep, Jeff Bridges and Katie Holmes

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama

programme.title: Play It Forward
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports presents an emotional story of family, sacrifice and the pursuit of your dreams as candidly told through the lives of legendary NFL tight end and future Hall of Fame inductee Tony Gonzalez and his older brother Chris

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Wilbur
programme.desc: A lonely, stuttering London baker who is still something of a mama's boy despite being his thirties pines for love in this quirky comedy from AFI student Dago Rodriguez

programme.title: Quiz Show
programme.desc: In 1957 awkward Herb Stempel (John Turturro) is unseated as reigning champ of TV's popular quiz show Twenty-One. The show's new star is handsome professor Charles Van Doren (Ralph Fiennes), who sends ratings soaring. The show's a fraud, however, and lawyer Richard Goodwin (Rob Morrow) launches a probe that results in scandal. Paul Scofield, David Paymer, Hank Azaria, Christopher McDonald and Mira Sorvino costar in director Robert Redford's acclaimed drama, which earned four Oscar nominations

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues

programme.title: Black Filmmaker Showcase: Saturday Night Life
programme.desc: Writer-director Ava DuVernay's short drama concerns a poor, struggling single mother whose trip with her three children to a 99-cent store in Los Angeles becomes an unexpectedly uplifting family experience. Melissa DeSousa ("The Best Man") stars

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Adios, Para Siempre
programme.desc: A crime scene photographer is drawn into an ingenious game of images that could spell his doom in this short from filmmaker David Guillermo Barba

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Worth the Fall
programme.desc: When he witnesses a principal's sexual misconduct toward a student at the middle school where he works, an immigrant janitor must decide whether or not to report the incident - a choice that could get his wife deported

programme.title: Holy Man
programme.desc: A stressed-out executive at the Good Buy home shopping channel (Jeff Goldblum) is praying for a miracle that will lift the network's lousy ratings and save his job when, from out of nowhere, an outrageous, self-styled inspirational guru (Eddie Murphy) with a knack for showing up where he isn't exactly wanted, wanders in front of the cameras just long enough to exude the irresistible star quality that will make him the sales-boosting savior the network has been looking for

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life

Paul Scofield, David Paymer, Hank Azaria, Christopher McDonald and Mira Sorvino costar in director Robert Redford's acclaimed drama, which earned four Oscar nominations

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong

programme.title: Freedom Writers
programme.desc: Hilary Swank stars in this drama about an idealistic California teacher who assigns her at-risk students in a gang-infested high school to writer journals that chronicle their troubled lives. Patrick Dempsey, Imelda Staunton and Scott Glenn costar(n)

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Veracity
programme.desc: Two teenage girls are outed at high school for being gay and are faced with difficult choices about their friendship, their sexual identity and themselves in this short film directed by Seith Mann and written by Janaya Greene(n)

programme.title: Bella
programme.desc: An international soccer star is on his way to sign a multimillion-dollar contract when a series of events unfold that bring his career to an abrupt end, and when his life intersects with a waitress struggling to make it in New York, both of their lives change irrevocably, turning one ordinary day into an unforgettable experience(n)

programme.title: Away From Her
programme.desc: A lovingly devoted couple feel their unshakable longtime bond begin to unravel thanks to the ravages of Alzheimer's Disease in this remarkable tour-de-force of acting and powerfully emotional writing from first-time director Sarah Polley. Gordon Pinsent, Julie Christie and Olympia Dukakis star(n)

programme.title: One Direction - Where We Are: Live from San Siro Stadium
programme.desc: Filmed over two nights at the iconic San Siro Stadium in Milan, this concert film features the chart topping pop sensation boy band One Direction performing all their biggest hits(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Huck Finn
programme.desc: The classic American novel by Mark Twain becomes this skillful adaptation starring Elijah Wood as a truant runaway who escapes down the Mississippi River accompanied by an escaped slave named Jim (Courtney B. Vance). Anne Heche costars(n)

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: An imaginative young Australian boy discovers that his talent for folding and flying paper planes could take him to the World Paper Plane Championships to compete against powerful rivals. Stars Sam Worthington(n)

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Tears and Tortillas
programme.desc: A Mexican grandmother is miraculously reunited with a long-lost love while making tortillas in this charming short from filmmaker Xochitl Dorsey(n)

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: House Not Home
programme.desc: A gender fluid teenager navigates bullying and violence from peers and rejection from a parent on the journey out of the closet. Directed by Joshua Butler and written by teen Skyler Edge(n)

programme.title: Alone for Christmas
programme.desc: When a group of robbers infiltrate the neighborhood of a badly behaved dog who has been left at home for the holiday, he must use every trick he has, with the help of a few friends, to save Christmas(n)

programme.title: One Direction - Where We Are: Live from San Siro Stadium
programme.desc: Filmed over two nights at the iconic San Siro Stadium in Milan, this concert film features the chart topping pop sensation boy band One Direction performing all their biggest hits(n)

programme.desc: An imaginative young Australian boy discovers that his talent for folding and flying paper planes could take him to the World Paper Plane Championships to compete against powerful rivals. Stars Sam Worthington(n)

programme.title: The Legend Of Gator Face
programme.desc: Teen pranksters (Johnny White and Dan Warry-Smith) try to put one over on Vernon, Mississippi with their mythical swamp monster, but not unless the real thing has anything to say about it. Paul Winfield costars in this engaging family comedy(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Huck Finn
programme.desc: The classic American novel by Mark Twain becomes this skillful adaptation starring Elijah Wood as a truant runaway who escapes down the Mississippi River accompanied by an escaped slave named Jim (Courtney B. Vance). Anne Heche costars(n)

programme.title: Six Days Seven Nights
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Anne Heche and Harrison Ford as a New York magazine editor and a gruff pilot who must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island

programme.title: Up in the Air
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner George Clooney stars in this dramatic comedy as a corporate downsizing expert whose cherished life on the road, without commitments, is threatened just when he's on the cusp of achieving his frequent flying dreams. Also stars Anna Kendrick

programme.title: Dreamcatcher
programme.desc: Documentary about a former Chicago prostitute who helps women and teenage girls break the cycle of abuse and exploitation - and lays bare the hidden violence that devastates the lives of young women, their families and the communities they live in

programme.title: Match
programme.desc: Patrick Stewart stars as a master dance teacher and choreographer with a lifetime of memories, who is interviewed by a young couple and unexpectedly forced to confront the painful decisions he thought he left in the past

programme.title: Mistress
programme.desc: Robert Wuhl stars as a movie director who's got integrity, vision, and a serious script - but no career. Martin Landau is the sleazy producer who introduces Wuhl to Robert De Niro, Danny Aiello and Eli Wallach - three guys with money who are willing to invest in the movie. There's just one catch: each one wants his girlfriend to be the star. Putting the deal together and keeping the mistress happy turns into a hilarious expose of the truth about Hollywood

programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: Oscar winner® Anne Hathaway stars as a woman whose musician brother is left in a coma following a car accident, leading her to seek out his idols and finding herself falling for an unlikely match in this romantic drama set against the backdrop of Brooklyn's vibrant indie music scene

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Classic romantic comedy starring Julia Roberts as a world famous movie star, who finds an unlikely connection with a troubled bookstore owner in the eclectic London neighborhood of Notting Hill. Co-stars Hugh Grant

programme.title: One Direction - Where We Are: Live from San Siro Stadium
programme.desc: Filmed over two nights at the iconic San Siro Stadium in Milan, this concert film features the chart topping pop sensation boy band One Direction performing all their biggest hits

programme.title: What If
programme.desc: Comedy starring Daniel Radcliffe as a med school dropout who can't keep his love life in order or keep it separate from a new friendship with a woman who, inconveniently, has a boyfriend. Also stars Zoe Kazan and Adam Driver

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart stars as a young woman who joins the military to escape her small town roots but ends up as a rookie guard at Guantanamo Bay where she strikes up an unusual and life changing friendship with one of the detainees

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Cate Blanchett is a small-town psychic named Annie, a widow using her clairvoyance to support herself and her sons. When she has visions involving the death of a local party girl (Katie Holmes), she suspects Donnie (Keanu Reeves), a violent wife beater. Sure enough, the victim's body is recovered in Donnie's pond, but is Annie interpreting her visions correctly, or is a killer still on the loose?

programme.title: StreetDance 2
programme.desc: After suffering humiliation by a rival crew, a street dancer gathers the best dancers from around the world for a rematch

programme.title: Girl on the Edge
programme.desc: A troubled teenager who falls victim to an online predator is sent to an experimental treatment center to recover from the trauma, where she fights the demons of the past with the help of her new friends and a rescued horse

programme.title: Like Sunday, Like Rain
programme.desc: A 12-year-old rich kid cello prodigy wants for nothing but the attention of his absent parents until a young musician is hired as his au pair and an unexpected friendship blossoms. Stars Leighton Meester and Debra Messing

programme.title: What If
programme.desc: Comedy starring Daniel Radcliffe as a med school dropout who can't keep his love life in order or keep it separate from a new friendship with a woman who, inconveniently, has a boyfriend. Also stars Zoe Kazan and Adam Driver(n)

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Classic romantic comedy starring Julia Roberts as a world famous movie star, who finds an unlikely connection with a troubled bookstore owner in the eclectic London neighborhood of Notting Hill. Co-stars Hugh Grant(n)

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Lara Croft (Angelina Jolie) is a buxom cross between Indiana Jones and James Bond, a British aristocrat who makes her living acquiring priceless antiquities by any means necessary. When she discovers that an ancient relic sought by her late father holds the key to power over time, she's quickly strapping on her side arms and hopping the globe, hoping to beat a sinister ancient group called the Illuminati in the quest to recover the artifact. Jon Voight, Iain Glen and Mark Collie costar in this action-packed smash based on a popular video game(n)

programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A handsome Don Juan finds his life a living nightmare in Alejandro Amenabar's intriguing Spanish genre-bender, which mixes science fiction, horror and psychological thriller. No sooner has Cesar (Eduardo Noriega) met the woman of his dreams (Peneope Cruz), than a jilted ex (Najwa Nimri) decides to wreak her revenge. Alas, that's only the beginning of Cesar's problems. Be prepared for a wild and twisty ride in this sexy and challenging philosophical puzzlebox. Later remade as "Vanilla Sky," in which Cruz reprised her costarring role(n)

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart stars as a young woman who joins the military to escape her small town roots but ends up as a rookie guard at Guantanamo Bay where she strikes up an unusual and life changing friendship with one of the detainees(n)

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn(n)

programme.title: Frequencies
programme.desc: In this futuristic tale where human frequencies determine luck, love, and destiny, a young college student must overcome science in order to love a woman who emits a different frequency than his own(n)

programme.title: Away From Her
programme.desc: A lovingly devoted couple feel their unshakable longtime bond begin to unravel thanks to the ravages of Alzheimer's Disease in this remarkable tour-de-force of acting and powerfully emotional writing from first-time director Sarah Polley. Gordon Pinsent, Julie Christie and Olympia Dukakis star(n)

programme.title: Dr. T & The Women
programme.desc: Director Robert Altman's ("Gosford Park") comic portrait of a Dallas gynecologist nicknamed Dr. T (Richard Gere), whose career couldn't be better while his personal life falls apart. When his beloved wife (Farrah Fawcett) is hospitalized with a hopeless mental breakdown, Dr. T finds solace in the arms of a golf pro (Helen Hunt) while his cheerleader daughter (Kate Hudson) grapples with her own romantic problem: she's soon to be married but in love with another woman (Liv Tyler). Janine Turner, Tara Reid, Shelley Long and Laura Dern costar(n)

programme.title: Heather McDonald: I Don't Mean to Brag
programme.desc: Writer and performer Heather McDonald doesn't hold back in her first ever solo comedy special, which showcases her hilarious storytelling talents. With wit, smarts and a definite edge, she recounts the many ways she attempts to balance fame and family(n)

programme.title: Alfie (2004)
programme.desc: Jude Law stars in this romantic drama as a womanizing British limo driver in Manhattan who finds that his good looks, devil-may-care attitude and little-boy charm are becoming poor substitutes for true love and lasting friendship. Marisa Tomei, Sienna Miller, Susan Sarandon, Omar Epps and Nia Long costar in this remake of the 1966 classic(n)

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: Kate Winslet and Leonardo DiCaprio star as a married couple trying to escape the suburban inertia of 1950s Connecticut but when they put an audacious plan in motion to move to Paris, their relationship is pushed to the brink(n)

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Trouble in Eden. More detective work is due for our intrepid amateur crimebuster. Jessica helps a friend unravel the mystery surrounding her sister's death

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Indian Giver. Another involving case for our tireless lady sleuth. The residents of Cabot Cove become concerned when an Indian appears, stating that the town belongs to him

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Doom With a View. Crime never sleeps, especially when Jessica Fletcher's in town. Avoid parties if she's invited! Jessica fights to clear Grady of a woman's murder

programme.title: Hart to Hart
programme.sub-title: With This Hart I Thee Wed
programme.desc: With This Hart I Thee Wed. A poisoned wedding cake consummates Jennifer's aunt's marriage. Rene: Eva Gabor. Charles: William Windom. Jennifer: Stefanie Powers. Jonathan: Robert Wagner. Justin: John Gabriel

programme.title: Hart to Hart
programme.desc: Million Dollar Harts. In a London casino, a baron wins millions, but disappears before cashing in his chips. Stefanie Powers, Robert Wagner. Baron Destafnik: Jeremy Kemp. Nigel Hegland: Bernard Fox

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The Fighter. Matlock goes the distance to help a heavyweight boxing champ (Ken Foree) accused of killing a sports reporter. Clayton Ross: Stanley Kamel. Alana Leon: Wanda De Jesus. Mickey Callahan: Dick Bakalyan. Nick Underwood: Christopher Allport. Matlock: Andy Griffith

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The Critic. Matlock helps an old friend after he is arrested when a critic of his play is found murdered

programme.title: Columbo

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Young wizard-in-training Harry Potter (Daniel Radcliffe) returns to Hogwarts for his fifth year of studies, only to find that the magical community seems to be in a curious state of denial about his recent encounter with the sinister Lord Voldemort (Ralph Fiennes) in the fifth installment of the popular fantasy film series based on the best-selling books by author J.K. Rowling. Rumor has it that the dreaded Lord Voldemort has returned, but Minister for Magic Cornelius Fudge (Robert Hardy) isn't so sure what to make of all the hearsay currently floating around the campus of Hogwarts. Suspecting that Headmaster Albus Dumbledore (Michael Gambon) may be fueling the rumors regarding Voldemort's return in order to undermine his authority and lay claim to his job, Fudge entrusts newly arrived Defense Against the Dark Arts professor Dolores Umbridge (Imelda Staunton) with the task of tracking Dumbledore and keeping a protective watch over the nervous student body. The young wizards of Hogwarts will need something much more effective than Umbridge's Ministry-approved course in defensive magic if they are to truly succeed in the extraordinary battle that lies ahead, however, and when the administration fails to provide the students with the tools that they will need to defend Hogwarts against the fearsome powers of the Dark Arts, Hermione (Emma Watson), Ron (Rupert Grint), and Harry take it upon themselves to recruit a small group of students to form "Dumbledore's Army" in preparation for the ultimate supernatural showdown(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Jason Bourne'

programme.title: My Life in Ruins
programme.desc: After losing her teaching job in Athens, American born Georgia (Nia Vardalos) takes a job as a tour guide. But the tourists, mostly Americans, are bored with history and facts all they want to do is to shop. Hopeless and lost, Georgia gets a new chance to find her mojo when she meets a solo vacationer (Richard Dreyfuss) who maintains a jovial facade despite the fact that he misses his late wife dearly. Thanks to an unlikely friendship, Georgia comes to realize that true love may be closer than she thinks(n)

programme.title: Slither
