programme.title: Love & Basketball
programme.desc: Gina Prince-Bythewood's warm and assured debut feature is a charming coming-of-age drama following the lives of Monica Wright and Quincy McCall. Both basketball stars for their respective high-school teams, as their careers progress through college and then into the professional leagues, their romance grows (although not without its ups and downs). The film is not just about shooting hoops but the pressure of being a sports star, the expectations young shoulders are expected to bear, and the familial problems that ensue

programme.title: Autumn in New York
programme.desc: Sentimental romantic drama set in New York, charting the relationship that develops between a philandering restaurant tycoon and a terminally ill young woman. Initially reluctant to commit, the ageing Lothario soon succumbs to her charms, setting in motion a series of events that profoundly affects both their lives

programme.title: 112 Weddings
programme.desc: In this documentary 112 Weddings a wedding photographer tracks down his former customers to find out if married life has worked out for them

programme.title: The Time Machine
programme.desc: A scientist embarks upon a time-travelling adventure, experiencing the battles and destruction of several world wars before settling in a seemingly Edenic community in 802,701 AD. But while the citizens' idyllic existence is somewhat vacuous, with little independence or individual thought, a second community - a group of underground cannibals - steals his time machine, leaving him trapped in their dangerous world

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: Following up his blockbuster action hit Mr. and Mrs. Smith, director Doug Liman turns to an entirely new genre -- sci-fi -- for this tale of an underground world of teleporters. Based on the novel by Steven Gould, Jumper concerns David (Hayden Christensen), a young man who quite literally wills himself away from his grim family life by teleporting to another place with the power of his mind. Years later, David is using his powers to raid bank vaults, seduce girls in London, lunch on the pyramids, and surf in Fiji. But he soon discovers that he is not the only one bestowed with this unique gift, and all is not well in the world of jumpers. There are people out there, such as Roland (Samuel L. Jackson), who view jumpers as a threat to all humankind, and have made it their mission in life to eliminate them. After jumping back to Michigan to get reacquainted with his long lost love, Millie (Rachel Bilson), David makes the acquaintance of experienced jumper Griffin (Jamie Bell). Informed by Griffin of a secret between jumpers and a shadowy group that seeks to destroy them, the pair soon finds themselves facing off against a legion of murderous opponents who won't stop fighting until every last jumper has been eliminated

programme.title: Out on a Limb
programme.desc: Manhattan stockbroker Bill Campbell is just about to sew up the biggest deal of his life when he gets a call from his younger sister, who reckons that her stepfather is involved in something crooked. So on his way to complete the multi-million dollar deal, Bill agrees to stop by in the backward town of Buzzsaw to comfort his sister. But then things start to go wrong - he's kidnapped by an armed redhead named Sally, who deprives him of his clothes, his car and, most crucially, the wallet which contains the 'phone number Bill needs to finish his business transaction. Now he has just 24 hours to get his possessions back before his chances of becoming rich and famous evaporate forever. And in the slow-paced, slow-witted town of Buzzsaw, help is not exactly in abundance!(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Computer-animated comedy. Po the Panda is overweight and works in his father's noodle bar but dreams of being a great Kung Fu warrior like his heroes, the Furious Five. When Master Oogway announces he is going to select the next Dragon Warrior to fight the evil Tai Lung, Po is desperate to be there to watch the historic ceremony. But to his and everyone else's surprise, Po finds out that the next Dragon Warrior is him. Master Shifu and the Furious Five, despite their misgivings, must prepare Po for his destiny - and the fight of his life(n)

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global super stardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds in this spirited adapted musical fantasy(n)

programme.title: Coraline
programme.desc: Director Henry Selick (The Nightmare Before Christmas; James and the Giant Peach) delivers a deliciously dark stop-motion animated adventure for children who don't mind a scare or two, based on Neil Gaiman's much-praised book. Coraline Jones and her parents have just moved into the Pink Palaces Apartments in Oregon, where they find themselves surrounded by eccentric neighbours, including a pair of ageing burlesque performers. It should be an exciting time, but Coraline's parents are too busy working as horticultural journalists to spend any time with her, so she is deeply bored. That is until she discovers a mysterious door that only appears after dark. Bold and inquisitive, the youngster investigates. She discovers a brightly coloured alternative universe, where her 'Other Mother' has plenty of time to play with her and her neighbours' quirks are charmingly exaggerated; in fact, she's tempted to stay. But all is not as it seems: everyone in the new world has buttons for eyes - and the operation to install them involves knitting needles. And that revelation is just the first of her shocking discoveries about the true nature of her apparent idyll... So, there's definitely good reason for that PG certificate, though children who can cope with the story of Hansel and Gretel shouldn't find anything too disturbing here. Selick's film won great critical acclaim, and scooped festival prizes around the world, as well as picking up an Oscar nomination and winning the 2009 BAFTA Children's Award. Also featuring the voices of Keith David, Robert Bailey Jr and Ian McShane(n)

programme.title: The Electric Company

programme.title: Crashbox
programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Jonas Brothers: The Concert Experience
programme.desc: The Jonas Brothers burn up the big screen in this 3-D rockumentary chronicling their "Burning Up" concert tour. The film features exclusive behind-the-scenes footage, a brand-new song, and special guest performances by Taylor Swift and Demi Lovato. Directed by Bruce Hendricks ("Hannah Montana/Miley Cyrus: Best of Both Worlds Concert")(n)

programme.title: The Weight of the Nation for Kids
programme.desc: Quiz Ed!. Kids are tested on their knowledge of nutrition, and try to engage in physical activities and exercise even though some of them are not athletically inclined or involved in sports(n)

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global super stardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds in this spirited adapted musical fantasy(n)

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Evan Baxter is a rising congressman with a bright future and his goal to change the world. God hears this message and decides to give him a hand. Delivering Evan the material and the animals, he sets Evan the task of building an ark. After trying to ignore God as much as possible, Evan eventually goes ahead with the plan, even if the other Congressmen and his family thinks he's mad(n)

programme.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Jim Henson's colourful characters re-tell the classic Charles Dickens tale, throwing in a few musical numbers along the way. Family(n)

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: A New York drug dealer is pursued by a determined cop

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: Ben finds the map to a secret treasure hidden by America's founding fathers. He wants to protect the hoard from greedy Ian, and the only way to save it is to beat him to the prize

programme.title: Standing Still
programme.desc: When a diverse group of lifelong friends comes together to celebrate the marriage of devoted couple Elise (Amy Adams) and Michael (Adam Garcia), the mixed-up relationships of the past pave the road to a weekend no one is likely to soon forget in the feature debut from filmmaker Matthew Cole Weiss. The setting is Los Angeles, CA, and the event is the wedding between a man and a woman who always seemed destined to be together. Unfortunately, all relationships can't be as healthy as Elise and Michael's is, and though best man and maid of honor Rich (Aaron Stanford) and Samantha (Melissa Sagemiller) seem to be preparing to take the plunge, the same certainly cannot be said for neurotic actress Lana (Mena Suvari). A free-spirited soul who has experienced flings with a variety of wedding attendees including the hapless Pockets (Jon Abrahams), alcoholic actor Simon (James Van Der Beek), and manic children's television program host Donovan (Ethan Embry), Lana attempts to sort out her past flings as lovelorn agent Quentin (Colin Hanks) pines for the bride's sister and the estranged father of the groom attempts to reconnect with his long-lost son

programme.title: Rocket Science
programme.desc: Jeffrey Blitz's seriocomedy Rocket Science proves that many a handicap can be overcome, no matter how daunting the obstacle at hand may initially seem. Newcomer Reece Thompson plays Hal Hefner, a 15-year-old high-school student with a minor yet socially alienating (and painful) disability: he stutters uncontrollably. Determined to work through the problem, Hal opts for an extreme route -- he joins the school debating team, which sends him on a headfirst plunge into breakneck speech competitions -- and offers a much-needed boost toward correcting the problem. Blitz, like his onscreen alter ego, struggled with a stammer as a young man -- a disability he eventually surmounted -- which imparted him with a lifelong interest in speech and storytelling

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: When a hapless aquarium cleaner accidentally kills a tank of expensive fish, he is forced to become a male gigolo to pay for the damage

programme.title: Ferrell Takes the Field
programme.desc: Will Ferrell plays baseball in five spring training games for 10 different teams on one day in March 2015 as a fund-raiser for cancer research, and to honor former major leaguer Bert Campaneris, who played every position in a game in 1965 for the Kansas City A's

programme.title: The Tailor of Panama
programme.desc: (2001) Pierce Brosnan plays Andrew Osnard, a British spy banished to Panama after a series of indiscretions. Trying to win himself back into favour, he latches on to tailor Harry Pendel (Geoffrey Rush), whose wife Louisa (Jamie Lee Curtis) works for the government

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: A former warrior surrenders his soul in order to save his family in this Dracula origins story

programme.title: Making of 'Dracula Untold'
programme.desc: A look at "Dracula Untold," a 2014 horror film that tells the mythical story of Vlad the Impaler's transformation into Dracula. The film stars Luke Evans, Sarah Gadon and Charles Dance, and is directed by Gary Shore

programme.title: The Black Dahlia
programme.desc: Former boxers and detectives Bucky Bleichert (Josh Hartnett) and Lee Blanchard (Aaron Eckhart) are in charge of investigating the brutal murder of Elizabeth Short (Mia Kirshner) an ambitious, aspiring b-movie actress known as The Black Dahlia. While Blanchards obsession to solve the case jeopardizes his relationship with the beautiful Kay (Scarlett Johansson), his partner Bleichert becomes attracted to Madeleine Linscott (Hilary Swank), a mysterious girl who belongs to one of the city¿s most powerful families and has suspicious ties to the victim. In this occasion, De Palma (Carrie, Scarface, Dressed to Kill, Mission Impossible) has woven a web of obsession, love, corruption, greed and perversion around a true story the brutal murder of the actress that shocked the United States in 1947 and still remains unsolved

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: In this creepy prequel to hit horror The Conjuring, a couple are tormented by a doll that has been possessed by an evil spirit

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: In this installment of the "Vacation" series, the youngest son of the Griswold clan, now grown with a family of his own, sets out to recreate a cross-country road trip from his youth to an amusement park

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: A former warrior surrenders his soul in order to save his family in this Dracula origins story

programme.title: Making of 'Pitch Perfect 2'
programme.desc: A look at "Pitch Perfect 2," a 2015 musical comedy about a collegiate a cappella group that enters an international competition no U.S. team has ever won. The sequel to the 2012 film stars Anna Kendrick, Skylar Astin and Rebel Wilson, and is directed by Elizabeth Banks

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends inadvertently stir a dark force while attempting to contact their late pal through a Ouija board

programme.title: Dave Chappelle's Block Party
programme.desc: Comedian Dave Chappelle hosts a rib-tickling, foot-stomping, booty-shaking celebration in Brooklyn's Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood and supplies the musical star power, including Kanye West and the Fugees' first performance together in seven years. Also featured: Mos Def, the Roots, Jill Scott, Erykah Badu, Common, Dead Prez, Andre 4000 and Cody Chestnutt. Directed by Michel Gondry(n)

programme.title: Drop Zone
programme.desc: A team of skydiving crooks led by DEA-agent-turned-bad Busey specialize in landing on police roofs and breaking in so their evil computer nerd can steal undercover agents' files and sell them to drug lords. Federal Marshal Snipes lost a brother to this crew and learns skydiving with the help of tough-but-lovable instructor Butler so he can track them down(n)

programme.title: The Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: Following up The Country Bears and Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl, Disney continued their theme-park-attraction-based film kick with this horror comedy from director Rob Minkoff (Stuart Little). The Haunted Mansion stars Eddie Murphy as Jim Evers, an overworked patriarch who, along with his neglected family, finds himself in mansion inhabited by 999 ghosts. Once the fright wears off, the inhabitants of the other side teach Evers a lesson about the importance of family. Along with Don Knotts, who's had his share of spooky experiences in Disney flicks, the film also stars Terence Stamp, Aree Davis, and Jennifer Tilly(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.sub-title: Murray Takes It to the Next Level
programme.desc: Murray Takes It to the Next Level. When Murray decides to move Bret and Jemaine up from the level of 'colleagues' to 'friends', they meet Murray's best friend Jim and accidentally insult him. Comedy series about Kiwi folk musicians Bret and Jemaine as they to try to make it big in New York(n)

programme.title: Sudden Death
programme.desc: A man battles for the release of a girl, kidnapped by a crazed extortionist, as a bomb ticks away in a crowded hockey stadium(n)

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
programme.desc: The infamous story of Benjamin Barker, a.k.a Sweeney Todd, who sets up a barber shop down in London which is the basis for a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett(n)

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: Genetically mutated sharks try to exact revenge on the research scientists who experimented on them(n)

programme.title: Lost River
programme.desc: A financially strapped single mother descends into a dark world in order to protect her family. Meanwhile, her son confronts the town bully and discovers a hidden utopia(n)

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: An Oscar-nominated Will Smith stars as Muhammad Ali in Michael Mann's heavyweight biopic of the boxing icon. Co-starring Jamie Foxx and Jon Voight. (2001)(160 mins)(n)

programme.title: The Jacket
programme.desc: Psychological thriller with Adrien Brody as a troubled war veteran trying to unlock his memories(n)

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: A Trusty Steed. A school evaluator's arrival rattles Gamby and Russell, who cross boundaries with Dr. Brown(n)

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Tale of a broken-down former pro-wrestling superstar fallen on hard times and grappling with a rocky personal life while looking for a chance at a comeback in the ring(n)

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Chronicle of the seminal rap group N.W.A. and their 'hood-to-riches success, tracing their story from the mean streets of mid-'80s Compton to their triumphant battles against censorship(n)

programme.title: 2016 Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony
programme.desc: The 31st annual gala honors Cheap Trick, Chicago, Deep Purple, Steve Miller, N.W.A. and songwriter-producer Bert Berns. Taped April 8, 2016, in Brooklyn at the Barclays Center(n)

programme.title: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: An entrepreneur decides to expand his booming hotel business when a single vacancy leaves little room for a variety of eccentric senior citizens looking for a place within The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel for the Elderly and Beautiful(n)

programme.title: Kiss the Girls
programme.desc: (1997) Gary Fleder's thriller, based on James Patterson's novel, stars Morgan Freeman in his first outing as forensic psychologist Alex Cross. Called in to track the kidnapper and killer of young girls, he's joined by Dr Kate McTiernan (Ashley Judd), who has escaped the killer's dungeon. The investigation gets personal when his niece Naomi (Gina Ravera) is kidnapped(n)

programme.title: One Last Hug (...and a few smooches) Three Days at Grief Camp
programme.desc: A visit to Camp Erin, a getaway for children who are dealing with the loss of a loved one with help from counselors, volunteers and other kids. The camp was founded by former baseball player Jamie Moyer and his wife, Karen, in memory of a fan who died of cancer at 17, and there are more than 40 nationwide(n)

programme.title: My Depression: The Up and Down and Up of It
programme.desc: An animated, musical adaptation of writer-composer Elizabeth Swados' book depicting her lifelong struggle with depression(n)

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: Alfonso Gomez-Rejon's Me and Earl and the Dying Girl stars Thomas Mann as Greg, a high-school senior who spends most of his time filming low-budget remakes of classic movies with his friend Earl (RJ Cyler). Greg purposefully leads an antisocial life; his mother, concerned with his behavior, pushes him to befriend a classmate named Rachel (Olivia Cooke) who is battling leukemia. The two surprisingly develop a rich friendship, and she helps Greg and Earl with their creative endeavors. But when Rachel's condition grows more serious, Greg must deal with the messiness of real life. Me and Earl and the Dying Girl screened at the 2015 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar
programme.desc: Three New York drag queens travel cross-country on their way to Hollywood, but a broken-down car strands them in a narrow-minded country town, where they share makeup tips with the ladies and show the hostile men how to treat women right(n)

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: A furloughed convict teams with a joint American-Chinese anticyber-theft task force to root out a hacker based in Southeast Asia(n)

programme.title: Far From the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: The story of headstrong Bathsheba Everdene who attracts three different suitors; Sergeant Frank Troy, bachelor William Boldwood, and sheep farmer Gabriel Oak(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a "60 Minutes" expose on Big Tobacco(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: Ben Anderson reports on the battle against ISIS in Iraq and Syria, and meets captured ISIS fighters in Kurdistan. Also included: remarks by former ambassador Ryan Crocker; Middle East expert Ali Khedery; and Russian prime minister Dmitry Medvedev(n)

programme.title: I Think I Love My Wife
programme.desc: A married man who daydreams about being with other women finds his will and morals tested after he's visited by the ex-mistress of his old friend(n)

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: Segments include a profile of golf commentator David Feherty; a look at the marketing of the AR-15 combat rifle to U.S. consumers; and a report on a polo program for disadvantaged kids in Philadelphia.(n)

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: A furloughed convict teams with a joint American-Chinese anticyber-theft task force to root out a hacker based in Southeast Asia(n)

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: In a sun-parched future, loner Max gets caught up in the exodus of a clan of rebels fleeing an evil despot as they race across the Wasteland(n)

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: A slacker and a TV personality have a one-night stand that results in a pregnancy and a serious relationship(n)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: In this gothic romance set at the turn of the 20th century, a mysterious stranger named Sir Thomas Sharpe (Tom Hiddleston) woos young author Edith Cushing (Mia Wasikowska) and brings her as his bride to his mansion atop a clay mountain in Cumbria, England. There, Edith meets Sharpe's strange and secretive sister Lucille (Jessica Chastain), and learns that her new home holds many disturbing secrets that will force her to fight for her sanity and her very life. Directed by Guillermo del Toro(n)

programme.title: 10,000 B.C.
programme.desc: Prehistoric blockbuster with all the visual impact and CGI effects characteristic of the director of 'Independence Day'. An outcast mammoth-hunter embarks on an epic adventure after powerful invaders enslave his tribe. Setting out to rescue his kidnapped princess, he crosses uncharted realms, faces awesome monsters and forms an army to fight for liberation against the oppressive regime ofan advanced civilisation similar to ancient Egypt(n)

programme.title: Renaissance Man
programme.desc: Culture-clash comedy in which Danny DeVito tries to teach Shakespeare to a group of "ineducable" soldiers(n)

programme.title: Mystic Pizza
programme.desc: The tale of three waitresses in a Connecticut pizza parlour and their very different love stories. One is set to marry her high-school sweetheart, but decides that she wants to consummate their relationship before the wedding. However, her fiance wants to wait until the big day. One takes on a babysitting job and has an affair with her employer, whilst her sister hooks up with a rich boy only to find that she is being used(n)

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: Lena has just moved to the small, Southern town of Gatlin, where the only person who seems to understand her -- or dream of bigger places or ideas -- is a cute guy named Ethan Wate (Alden Ehrenreich), who recognizes her instantly from the cryptic dreams he's been having every night. Lena is an orphan, and she's come to stay with her mysterious uncle, Macon Ravenwood (Irons), the patriarch of her powerful family. Powerful, because The Ravenwood clan are Casters, born with powers that ordinary mortals don't have, like the ability to move objects, control the elements, and even step out of normal space and time to communicate only with each other. But just as Lena feels ready to open up to Ethan, she discovers that their love is in imminent danger, because when female Casters turn 16, their destiny as either good or evil is revealed. Unwilling to let her nature be dictated by forces outside her control, Lena and Ethan set out together to uncover the strange, secret lore of their families' intertwined histories dating back to the Civil War, and figure out how to grant Lena the power to choose her own destiny(n)

programme.title: Get On Up
programme.desc: A look at James Brown's rise from poverty to become one of the most influential entertainers in the world(n)

programme.title: Assassins
programme.desc: A cynical and burned-out hitman falls in love with the target of his final assignment, and has to deal with a hotshot young gun who wants to prove his greatness by taking the old-man out(n)

programme.title: Sinister 2
programme.desc: In this chilling sequel, two young brothers must defend themselves against a malevolent spirit that feeds on the corruption of innocence, and that documents its exploits in home movies(n)

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: An atmospheric phenomenon enables a New York police officer to communicate with his beloved dead father, a firefighter and amateur radio enthusiast, across thirty years. He manages to warn his father of his own death, but by changing events in history the two unwittingly cause a tragedy and now need to try to alter history again(n)

programme.title: Get Hard
programme.desc: When a millionaire is convicted of fraud and sentenced to a maximum-security prison, he hires a man he assumes is an ex-con to coach him on surviving incarceration(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: What Lurks Within. Rev. Anderson becomes increasingly alienated; Sidney's revelation stuns Kyle(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: What Lurks Within. Rev. Anderson becomes increasingly alienated; Sidney's revelation stuns Kyle(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: The Damage Done. Kyle and Allison reconnect to their past; and Rev. Anderson overdoes it during Remembrance Day(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: The steamy tale, adapted from the novel by E.L James, details a masochistic relationship between a college student and a businessman, whose desires for extreme intimacy stem from secrets in his past(n)

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: A slacker and a TV personality have a one-night stand that results in a pregnancy and a serious relationship(n)

programme.desc: When a millionaire is convicted of fraud and sentenced to a maximum-security prison, he hires a man he assumes is an ex-con to coach him on surviving incarceration(n)

programme.title: Exodus: Gods and Kings
programme.desc: A look at Ridley Scott's spectacular new take on the story of Moses

programme.title: Model for Murder
programme.desc: This British programmer stars American actor Keith Andes. In England to seek out his dead brother's girlfriend, Andes crosses the path of jewel robbers. Hazel Court is the lady in question, whose true involvement in the proceedings is the object of mystery and confusion

programme.title: The Perfect Weapon
programme.desc: A tough American street fighter stalks the streets of Chinatown in search of the organised criminals who killed his guardian. Action

programme.title: They Live
programme.desc: A drifter utilizes special sunglasses to see that aliens disguised as yuppies are taking over the world

programme.title: License to Drive
programme.desc: Action comedy in which a teenage boy who fails to pass his driving test takes his father's vintage car out for the night rather than miss out on a dream date. All manner of disasters ensue

programme.title: Win Win
programme.desc: Struggling small-time lawyer Mike makes an unethical decision to make some extra money from an elderly client, which unexpectedly results in Mike taking care of the old man's troubled grandson.The boy soon becomes part of his family and the best member of the high-school wresting team he coaches, but Mike's improper actions could become public when the boy's mother returns

programme.title: Unfinished Business
programme.desc: A businessman tries to land a major deal and save his fledging company. To do so, he and two co-workers, one very old and one very young, must take an overseas trip to show their potential customer a wild night on the town

programme.title: One Hour Photo
programme.desc: Sy Parrish has developed the Yorkin family's photos for years. They don't realise that the shy lab worker has adopted them, sticking up their snaps on his wall. The idyll is shattered when he finds out that the perfect family are not quite all they seem

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead
programme.desc: Gritty drama. An ambulance driver on the aptly named graveyard shift becomes haunted by the memories of those patients that he could not save. On the point of breakdown he strikes up an unlikely relationship with the daughter of a patient whose life he managed to save

programme.title: The Village
programme.desc: The people of Covington, a small town in rural Pennsylvania lead peaceful lives, only rarely disturbed by the creatures that inhabit the woods surrounding the village. An agreement has been reached with the creatures and peace prevails under the condition that the boundaries are respected. Yet this balance is disrupted when Lucius Hunt (Joaquin Phoenix), an inquisitive and willful young man, ventures himself beyond the limits of the village. After this, things will never be the same. Written and directed by M. Night Shyamalan, this is his third film after the huge success of The Sixth Sense

programme.title: Poltergeist
programme.desc: A young suburban girl is abducted by spirits that have besieged her family's home. Desperate, her parents devise a plan to rescue her from the other side

programme.title: Don't Say a Word
programme.desc: Michael Douglas stars in Gary Fleder's taut thriller as psychiatrist Nathan Conrad, who specialises in probing the minds of catatonic patients to release them from their state. His daughter Jessie is kidnapped as a bargaining tool by Patrick Koster who needs Conrad to unlock the mind of comatose teenager Elisabeth Burrows and 'extract' a number he needs. Conrad succeeds in extracting the number but he's not prepared to give up the information without a fight, as the climax leads to a showdown in a graveyard

programme.title: Cloud Atlas
programme.desc: Tom Hanks and Halle Berry star in this sci-fi epic weaving together six stories set in the past, present and future. Strong language/strong violence/sex/flashing images

programme.title: Mission to Mars
programme.desc: Atmospheric sci-fi suspense story about a team of astronauts sent on a rescue mission to the red planet to bring back survivors of the first manned landing on Mars. The first crew appear to have met with a mysterious disaster and when the rescuers arrive on the planet they find that Mars may not be as dead as the human race have assumed(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Biopic of Chris Kyle, a celebrated sniper in the American military. In the aftermath of 9/11, Kyle decides to serve his country by becoming a Navy SEAL. But with each tour of duty, he grows more detached from his wife and children(n)

programme.title: Born Killers
programme.desc: Two brothers who make their living through murder and theft find that their work gets harder when they tangle with an intelligent young woman(n)

programme.title: ¡Three Amigos!
programme.desc: A trio of silver-screen Western heroes are summoned to the town of Santa Poco, Mexico, which is under siege by bloodthirsty bandits. Believing it's just a "personal appearance," they answer the call and find they're up against real banditos!(n)

programme.title: 10,000 B.C.
programme.desc: A young outcast from a primitive tribe is forced to defend his people from a brutal onslaught in Independence Day director Roland Emmerich's fast-paced period adventure. Despite the fact that he is low man on the totem pole in his tribe of fearless hunters, a brave young boy (Steven Strait) longs to win the heart of a beautiful princess (Camilla Belle) who is well above his station in life. When an overwhelming horde of powerful invaders forces the hunters into slavery and abducts the princess, the once-aimless boy suddenly finds his destiny taking an unexpected turn. Now, if he has any hope of saving his tribe from certain extinction, this young boy will have to fight for the future to his dying breath(n)

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: Thriller/sci-fi/action adventure set in a dystopian future in which worldwide infertility has led to chaos. However, a British bureaucrat-turned-reluctant activist finds hope when he becomes the protector of the world's only pregnant woman(n)

programme.title: Unbroken
programme.desc: The true life tale of Louis Zamperini, the Olympic track star who survived a plane crash in World War II, only to fight for his life against nature and eventually as a prisoner of war(n)

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, the film follows the heroism of Captain Alexei Vostrikov who, at the height of the Cold War, is ordered to take command of the nuclear missile submarine K-19 away from its original commander Captain Mikhail Polenin. Vostrikov's mission is to quickly ready the ill-prepared sub for her maiden voyage - no matter what the cost. But Vostrikov, Polenin and K-19's loyal crew can never imagine all that is expected of them. Neither can they fathom what the price of failure might be for them and for the world when a nuclear reactor malfunctions, threatening a core meltdown and an explosion that will certainly kill all aboard. As they glide beneath the Arctic seas, it is the crew's collective bravery and Vostrikov's daring embrace of his duty toward his country and his men which will ultimately save K-19... and stave off what surely would have been a nuclear disaster(n)

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Tense psychological thriller. Young Cole Sear has a dark secret - he sees the spirits of dead people all around him. One day he blurts out the truth to psychologist Dr Malcolm Crowe, who tries to help the youngster and find out what is behind the disturbances. But Crowe's investigation into the boy's powers leads to unexpected consequences(n)

programme.title: AVPR: Aliens vs Predator---Requiem
programme.desc: A PredAlien hybrid causes a Predator ship to crash, scattering 'facehugger' aliens into a small, unsuspecting town. A Predator arrives from his homeworld to take on the Aliens(n)

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers
programme.desc: A brother and sister discover a lair full of modified bodies and before they know it are on the run from a terrifying beast on a ritualistic killing spree(n)

programme.title: Funny Games
programme.desc: Michael Haneke's American re-make of his 1997 German version loses none of the terror or horror in the translation. An all-American family - George, Ann and son Georgie - arrive at their summer cottage for a yachting holiday. Two polite young men, Paul and Peter introduce themselves as neighbours but suddenly and brutally instil a nihilistic, sadistic regime on the family, playing mind games and torturing them. Haneke famously makes the audience complicit, rewinding events, having Paul and Peter address the audience directly and making the violence happen off screen but having it still horribly audible in this claustrophobic nightmare(n)

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 3
programme.desc: Set prior to the haunting of the Lambert family, this truly disturbing prequel focuses on a psychic (Lin Shaye) who contacts the dead in order to help a teenage girl (Stefanie Scott) who's being haunted after a botched attempt at connecting with her deceased mother(n)

programme.title: Ghost Town
programme.desc: An annoying dentist is recruited by the spirit of a dead husband to stop his widow from remarrying

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 3
programme.desc: Set prior to the haunting of the Lambert family, this truly disturbing prequel focuses on a psychic (Lin Shaye) who contacts the dead in order to help a teenage girl (Stefanie Scott) who's being haunted after a botched attempt at connecting with her deceased mother

programme.title: Clean and Sober
programme.desc: Detox drama starring Michael Keaton as a fast-living, money-embezzling, drug-taking, alcoholic yuppie who gets into even more trouble when his girlfriend dies of an overdose

programme.title: Cocoon
programme.desc: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energised with youthful vigour

programme.title: The Number 23
programme.desc: Affable everyman Walter Sparrow is given a second-hand detective novel 'The Number 23' for his birthday, but grows increasingly obsessed with the parallels he sees between his life and that of the book's protagonist

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: In this gothic romance set at the turn of the 20th century, a mysterious stranger named Sir Thomas Sharpe (Tom Hiddleston) woos young author Edith Cushing (Mia Wasikowska) and brings her as his bride to his mansion atop a clay mountain in Cumbria, England. There, Edith meets Sharpe's strange and secretive sister Lucille (Jessica Chastain), and learns that her new home holds many disturbing secrets that will force her to fight for her sanity and her very life. Directed by Guillermo del Toro

programme.title: The Drop
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding crime thriller, a man working in an illegal scheme funneling cash to the local organized-crime syndicate through "money drops" gets caught in the crossfire of a robbery gone wrong

programme.title: The Godfather Epic
programme.desc: A chronological version of Francis Ford Coppola's first two films, about the powerful Corleone crime family in America in the first half of the 20th century, contains scenes that were not included in the original theatrical releases

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: In this gothic romance set at the turn of the 20th century, a mysterious stranger named Sir Thomas Sharpe (Tom Hiddleston) woos young author Edith Cushing (Mia Wasikowska) and brings her as his bride to his mansion atop a clay mountain in Cumbria, England. There, Edith meets Sharpe's strange and secretive sister Lucille (Jessica Chastain), and learns that her new home holds many disturbing secrets that will force her to fight for her sanity and her very life. Directed by Guillermo del Toro

programme.title: The Number 23
programme.desc: Affable everyman Walter Sparrow is given a second-hand detective novel 'The Number 23' for his birthday, but grows increasingly obsessed with the parallels he sees between his life and that of the book's protagonist

programme.title: High Crimes
programme.desc: Claire Kubik isn't sure what is true after her husband Tom is charged with murder. Apparently, he is former marine Ron Chapman, guilty of war crimes in El Salvador. The only lawyer who'll help Claire is Charlie Grimes. Can the pair uncover the national security secrets which will clear Tom?(n)

programme.title: Bodyguard: A New Beginning
programme.desc: A powerful Chinese Triad boss sends his top bodyguard to protect a young British woman in the UK, in the process creating a situation that threatens to destroy everything that he has worked for years to create. When it comes to loyalty, a crime boss simply couldn't ask for a better bodyguard than Leung. Leung's boss is notorious Hong Kong gangster Wong. The only person Wong trusts enough to travel to the UK and watch over a mysterious young British woman is Leung, and Leung is determined to make his boss proud. Not even Wong's own errant son Yuen is privy to the identity of the woman Leung has been assigned to protect. But when the secret gets out, Wong's once-powerful empire quickly begins to crumble(n)

programme.title: Play Misty for Me
programme.desc: A radio DJ is menaced by fan who starts out by repeatedly calling in to request her favourite song, but soon turns into a deadly threat(n)

programme.title: My Blueberry Nights
programme.desc: Pop chanteuse Norah Jones makes a stunning movie debut in this moody meditation on love lost and romantic longing. She plays a Manhattan waitress who hits the road on a cross-country odyssey to try to get over a relationship that went sour. Among the many interesting types she meets up with are a lovelorn cop (David Strathairn) and his cheating wife (Rachel Weisz), plus a shiftless gambler (Natalie Portman). Directed by Wong Kar-Wai, who co-wrote the script with crime novelist Lawrence Block(n)

programme.title: The Glass House
programme.desc: Taut direction and strong performances recommend this first-rate suspense yarn. When their parents are killed, two orphans (Trevor Morgan, Leelee Sobieski) move in with a wealthy and seemingly benevolent couple (Stellan Skarsgard, Diane Lane). But soon the adoptive parents begin to behave in a sinister manner, making the kids' lives a nightmare. Bruce Dern, Kathy Baker(n)

programme.title: The Departed
programme.desc: After six Oscar-nominations, Martin Scorsese finally picked up the statuette for this stunning, gripping crime thriller, based on the equally superb Hong Kong original Infernal Affairs . Matt Damon plays Colin Sullivan, the protégé of Boston gangster Frank Costello who has been groomed through police academy to become Frank's ears and eyes in the police department. Leonardo DiCaprio plays Billy Costigan, a cop deliberately disgraced so he can infiltrate Costello's gang to get enough information to bring him down. But Costello begins to smell a rat and demands Sullivan get him the name of the insider while Costigan realises the net may be closing in before he can get the information he needs. Superb performances from the three leads, with Nicholson reined in by Scorsese, supplemented by Oscar-nominee Mark Wahlberg as the foul-mouthed Sgt Dignam and Martin Sheen as Captain Queenan, Costigan's handlers who Sullivan must get past to find out his identity(n)

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: John Hughes crafts an exemplary '80s Brat Pack romance out of the standard Cinderella story in Pretty in Pink. Andie Walsh (Molly Ringwald) is a teenager who lives in the dingy part of town with her terminally underemployed dad (Harry Dean Stanton). She works at a record store with eccentric Ionia (Annie Potts) and is considered a misfit at her uppity high school, but somehow she rises above them all. Her oddball best friend, Duckie (Jon Cryer), is hopelessly in love with her, so he causes trouble for her romantic pursuits. When local rich kid Blaine (Andrew McCarthy) develops a fascination with her, they go out on a date together. Visiting the home bases of each social clique, they are basically ridiculed for their audacity to date one another. When Blaine eventually asks the delighted Andie to the prom, he is threatened by his rich friend Steff (James Spader). The romance versus high school social politics finally culminates at the big night of the prom(n)

programme.title: Once
programme.desc: Modern-day musical about a busker and a Czech immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story(n)

programme.title: Annie Hall
programme.desc: New York Jewish comedy writer Alvy Singer ponders the modern quest for love and his past romance with tightly-wound WASP singer Annie Hall(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Biopic of Chris Kyle, a celebrated sniper in the American military. In the aftermath of 9/11, Kyle decides to serve his country by becoming a Navy SEAL. But with each tour of duty, he grows more detached from his wife and children(n)

programme.title: Demolition Man
programme.desc: Sly Stallone blockbuster starring the muscular leading man as a cop brought out of deep freeze after 30 years to run down fiendish criminal Wesley Snipes. Breakneck, brash, surprisingly funny and utterly entertaining(n)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: Mark Millar and Dave Gibbons' comic series is adapted for the big screen in this Matthew Vaughn-directed action thriller. The story centers on a secret agent who recruits a juvenile delinquent into a top-secret spy organization. Together, they battle a tech genius with diabolical ambitions(n)

programme.title: The Boxer
programme.desc: Powerful drama about an ex-IRA man who returns to Belfast to rebuild his life after 14 years behind bars. On his homecoming, he finds his old sweetheart married to his best friend, who is now also imprisoned for terrorism, as he tries to establish a career as a fighter and boxing coach. His old feelings for the woman are rekindled, however, as friends, family and political players watch their every move and the threat of renewed violence looms(n)

programme.title: Wise Blood
programme.desc: Based on the novel of the same name by Flannery O'Connor, Wise Blood is a distrubing story of religious phonies in the South. Brad Dourif plays a soldier home from the war who changes his uniform for the garb of a preacher, although he has little belief in religion. He hooks up with a blind preacher who turns out not to be blind but who nevertheless persuades Dourif to be blind himself so he can learn the truth. Truth turns out to be illusory, however, as his landlady, who wants to care for him, virtually makes him a prisoner(n)

programme.title: The Drowning Pool
programme.desc: Paul Newman reprises his role of edgy detective Lew Harper to uncover a blackmail plot involving an oil baroness (Joanne Woodward)(n)

programme.title: Let's Do It Again
programme.desc: A pair of blue-collar buddies use hypnosis to turn a wimpy boxer into a champ in this crime comedy, which reunites actor/director Sidney Poitier and comedian Bill Cosby, stars of the similarly themed Uptown Saturday Night. Clyde Williams (Poitier) and Billy Foster (Cosby) want to help raise funds to sustain the Sons and Daughters of Shaka Lodge, their local community group. Given that Clyde was trained as a hypnotist while in the military, the pair decide to con mobster Biggie Smalls (Calvin Lockhart) by placing a high-stakes bet on a boxing match and then using hocus-pocus to transform skinny underdog Bootney Farnsworth (Jimmie Walker) into a bruiser. When Biggie finds out about their ruse, he and his thugs move in to reclaim their money, setting the stage for further laughs and sleight-of-hand. With a supporting cast that includes Denise Nicholas and Lee Chamberlin as the protagonists' wives and Ossie Davis as an elder at their lodge, Let's Do It Again also reunited Good Times stars Walker and John Amos to the silver screen. Cosby and Poitier would return two years later with A Piece of the Action, though Lockhart, another veteran of Uptown Saturday Night, would sit out the final team-up. Hip-hop fans will note that Lockhart's character provided one of the aliases for slain '90s rap star Christopher Wallace, also known as the Notorious B.I.G. The soundtrack for Let's Do It Again featured Curtis Mayfield songs performed by the the Staple Singers(n)

programme.title: MGM Parade Show
programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Shadow on the Wall
programme.desc: A murderess worries her crime will be revealed when the victim's daughter recovers from amnesia(n)

programme.title: The Next Voice You Hear
programme.desc: The contented life of Joe and Mary Smith is shaken one evening when they hear what seems to be the voice of God emanating from their radio - an event which has a profound effect on the town's other residents. The cast features Nancy Davis, later to become Nancy Reagan(n)

programme.title: Night into Morning
programme.desc: Ray Milland plays a happily married college professor whose wife and child perish in a fire. Despondent, Milland loses himself in drink, despite the efforts of his friends and fellow faculty members. He is on the verge of suicide before he is salvaged the love of Nancy Davis (who off-screen was busy becoming Nancy Reagan). Virtually plotless, Night into Morning is held together by the performance of Ray Milland and by the incisive direction of radio veteran Fletcher Markle(n)

programme.title: It's a Big Country
programme.desc: This eight-episode anthology examines a cross-section of perspectives and personalities of different ethnicities in 1950s America(n)

programme.title: Talk About a Stranger
programme.desc: A boy becomes obsessed with the idea that his unfriendly neighbor murdered the kid's beloved dog. The child sets off to find evidence, and discovers the man has an unusual past. Eventually the boy engages in an action that has dire consequences for himself and his community(n)

programme.title: Shadow in the Sky
programme.desc: A minor but effective MGM programmer, Shadow in the Sky stars Ralph Meeker as a shell-shocked World War II veteran. He is taken in by sympathetic relatives, who hope that a stable environment will help Meeker overcome his neuroses. But even these people find their compassion strained to the breaking point by Meeker's increasingly erratic (and violent) behavior. Nancy Davis (a year before becoming Nancy Reagan) plays one of the relatives, while Jean Hagen (later the screechy-voiced movie queen in Singin' in the Rain) plays Meeker's long-suffering girlfriend. Ben Maddow based his screenplay for Shadow in the Sky on a story by Edward Newhouse(n)

programme.title: Donovan's Brain
programme.desc: A cast headed by Lew Ayres breathes life into the chestnut about a dead person's evil brain invading the body of a live man. Nancy Davis. Schratt: Gene Evans. Yokum: Steve Brodie. Directed by Felix Feist(n)

programme.title: Hellcats of the Navy
programme.desc: In 1944, toward the end of World War II, Commander Casey Abbott of the United States Navy is assigned the strategic mission to retrieve an underwater mine developed by the Japanese, which is undetectable by radar(n)

programme.title: Crash Landing
programme.desc: Aboard an airliner that---you guessed it---develops engine trouble. Gary Merrill. Helen: Nancy Davis (Reagan). Bernice: Irene Hervey. John: Roger Smith. Ann Thatcher: Jewell Lain. Directed by Fred F. Sears(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Musketeer
programme.desc: Swashbuckler of 17th-century France, based on Alexandre Dumas' "The Man in the Iron Mask." Beau Bridges, Sylvia Kristel, Ursula Andress, Cornel Wilde, Ian McShane, Lloyd Bridges, Olivia de Havilland, Jose Ferrer, Rex Harrison. Ambassador: Helmut Dantine. Directed by Ken Annakin(n)

programme.title: The Swarm
programme.desc: Michael Caine and Katharine Ross faces a race for survival when a huge swarm of deadly African bees cause terror over an American city(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: It's Never Over. Ghost deals with loose ends before tangling with some new nightlife competition; Tommy confronts Tasha, who must learn to coexist with Angela. Later, Tommy finds an advisor in a former lover

programme.title: No Good Deed
programme.desc: A man terrorises a mother and her children after claiming car trouble to gain entry to their home

programme.title: Side Effects
programme.desc: A woman commits a horrific act while taking an anti-anxiety drug, which leads to a criminal investigation of her therapist that digs up possible evidence of past indiscretions

programme.title: Infinitely Polar Bear
programme.desc: In this comedy-drama set in the 1970s, a bipolar man promises his estranged wife that he will care for their two young daughters while she attends business school in New York

programme.title: Into the Grizzly Maze
programme.desc: In this tense thriller Rowman (James Marsden) arrives at his childhood home in Alaska to pay respects to his late father. He's joined by his brother, Beckett (Thomas Jane) a local law enforcement officer who has just witnessed a bloody scene involving two bootleg cutters who were killed by a grizzly. In an attempt to stop the bear, Douglass (Billy Bob Thornton) an experienced tracker is dispatched into the forest to locate the creature. As the parties converge, they discover that something is mysteriously driving the bears out of the maze. When a grizzly turns his attention to the group, they realize they are the ones being hunted. Directed by David Hackl

programme.title: Alien vs. Predator
programme.desc: A team of explorers enter a mysterious pyramid in the Antarctic only to find that it is an ancient battlefield for two ferocious species from outer space. Sci-fi/action

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Frank Martin is back as the Transporter, who'll take anything anywhere, no questions asked, for the right money. This time, he's earning what should be easy money guarding the son of government drugs czar Billings. But when the boy is kidnapped by drugs lord Gianni, Martin takes it as a professional slur and sets out to find the boy and the baddies in Louis Leterrier's all-action film, co-written by Luc Besson

In a true personal crusade against vampires, the hero finds himself in an even worse battle when a new, stronger species, resulting from a genetic cross, threatens to eliminate both man and vampires. To combat them, he must join his worst enemies(n)

programme.desc: A preview of the 2016 remake of "Ghostbusters," starring Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Wiig, Kate McKinnon and Leslie Jones as the paranormal investigators(n)

programme.desc: An inky black substance bonds to Peter Parker's suit. As the dark shadow grows, so do his internal conflicts. Dir: Sam Raimi. As Peter's personality darkens, he also risks losing the love of his life(n)

When he loses the medication that keeps his unpleasant alter ego at bay, both sides of his personality fight each other for the lady's affections(n)

programme.title: Foxcatcher
programme.desc: Docudrama about millionaire John du Pont and his relationship with brothers Dave and Mark Schultz, Olympic gold-medal wrestlers who train at his estate. Mark initially idolizes du Pont, but slowly realizes the depths of his benefactor's madness(n)

programme.title: Killing Zoe
programme.desc: An American ex-con gets caught up in a Parisian bank heist that goes wrong. Zed, a safe-cracking expert fresh out of prison, travels to France to participate in a robbery planned by his friend Eric, but things turn into a hostage situation(n)

programme.title: Master Harold...and the Boys
programme.desc: Athol Fugard's award-winning play about institutionalized racism during the Apartheid-era comes to the big screen under the direction of Emmy Award-winner Lonnie Price, who previously played the lead role of Hally in the original Broadway production. Growing up, Hally (Freddie Highmore) forged a lifetime's worth of fond memories alongside Sam and Willie, his family's two black servants. But years later, as a teenager, Hally learns that his alcoholic, invalid father will soon be returning home from the hospital, and impulsively lashes out at Sam and Willie. Meanwhile, the repercussions of Hally's rage prove devastating for everyone involved(n)

programme.title: Whiplash
programme.desc: A young jazz drummer is driven to the brink of insanity by his ruthless music teacher in this scorching psychological drama. If the talented drummer can just keep it together, he might be bound for greatness(n)

programme.title: Biutiful
programme.desc: Dignified criminal and caring family man Uxbal (Javier Bardem) works to put his affairs in order after being diagnosed with a terminal illness, only to realize that few of the people around him have any sense of responsibility in this moving drama(n)

programme.title: Coming Home
programme.desc: After a man is released from a labour camp during the last days of the Cultural Revolution, he returns home to find his wife has amnesia and does not recognise him(n)

programme.title: Lambert & Stamp
programme.desc: Profiling Kit Lambert and Chris Stamp, two filmmakers who became the managers of the rock band the Who(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: In this offbeat comedy from Woody Allen, nothing can snap a cynical philosophy professor out of a mental funk, except for a young student whose presence offers a breath of fresh air in his otherwise unfulfilling existence(n)

programme.title: The Weight of the Water
programme.desc: A photographer travels to New Hampshire to investigate the double murder of two women in 1873. Discovering an eye witness account she starts to see parallels between herself and a survivor(n)

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: Bullets, Babes & Bad Guys Based on the best-selling novel by JJ Connolly, Layer Cake is the impressive debut feature from Matthew Vaughn, (the producer of Lock Stock & Two Smoking Barrels and Snatch ) a twisting, turning and sexy thriller. Edith Bowman presents a behind-the-scenes look at one of the most eagerly anticipated British films in years. Featuring exclusive footage from the film, actors Daniel Craig and Sienna Miller, director Matthew Vaughan and other members of the crew tell us how they created the dynamic look of this fast-moving movie(n)

programme.title: Suburbia
programme.desc: A group of small-town slackers, with few goals or ambitions for the future, realize they're on the wrong track when a former classmate returns as a rock star and they don't have the money to see him play(n)

programme.title: Girl, Interrupted
programme.desc: Susanna Kaysen is depressed and unwell as a result of being out of touch with the society she grew up in. At eighteen she takes too many aspirins for her own good and is put in an asylum by the authorities. This is the story of her time in the mental hospital(n)

programme.title: Invincible
programme.desc: This powerful fact-based biopic, directed by legendary German filmmaker Werner Herzog, tells the tale of a Jewish strongman who leaves his home in Poland to entertain Nazi audiences in 1930s Berlin. Zishe Breitbart, the carnival-show Samson, is played by Jouko Ahola, a frequent competitor in World's Strongest Man contests. Tim Roth costars as a sinister Nazi spiritualist. Anna Gourari, Max Raabe(n)

programme.title: The Salt of the Earth
programme.desc: Profiling Brazilian photojournalist Sebastião Salgado, whose black-and-white portraits often focused on third-world countries and impoverished communities(n)

programme.title: Wolf Totem
programme.desc: In 1960s China, a student from Beijing is sent to teach a nomadic tribe in Mongolia. While there, he cares for and adopts a wolf cub, and their bond causes him to see the world in a new light(n)

programme.title: The Raven
programme.desc: When a spate of murders using the stories of Edgar Allan Poe occur across 19th century Baltimore, a stoic detective turns to the novelist for help in tracking down the killer. Mystery(n)

programme.title: The Weight of the Water
programme.desc: A photographer travels to New Hampshire to investigate the double murder of two women in 1873. Discovering an eye witness account she starts to see parallels between herself and a survivor(n)

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter helps an FBI agent track down a serial killer. Violent remake of "Manhunter."(n)

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: Bullets, Babes & Bad Guys Based on the best-selling novel by JJ Connolly, Layer Cake is the impressive debut feature from Matthew Vaughn, (the producer of Lock Stock & Two Smoking Barrels and Snatch ) a twisting, turning and sexy thriller. Edith Bowman presents a behind-the-scenes look at one of the most eagerly anticipated British films in years. Featuring exclusive footage from the film, actors Daniel Craig and Sienna Miller, director Matthew Vaughan and other members of the crew tell us how they created the dynamic look of this fast-moving movie(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: A debonair businessman thinks he's successfully pulled off a multi-million dollar bank heist, but he is soon being tracked by a beautiful insurance investigator who catches his eye. Crime(n)

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: The story revolves around Dr. Hannibal Lector, arrested for molestation, flees from custody. The story takes a turn when one of the vitims makes a plan to avenge the doctor(n)

programme.desc: In the 1930s two gambling-house proprietors fend off gangster Bugsy Calhoune from muscling into their operation

programme.title: Forever Lulu
programme.desc: Melanie Griffith ("Working Girl") and Patrick Swayze ("Dirty Dancing") star in this offbeat comedy-drama about a schizophrenic who tracks down her former boyfriend so he can help her find the child she gave up for adoption two decades earlier. Penelope Ann Miller, Joseph Gordon-Levitt

programme.title: Radio Days

programme.desc: ageous comedy with a bad day for car salesman Robin Williams. Fights with his ex-wife, the Mafia and now an Ak-47 carrying motorcyclist (Tim Robbins)

programme.desc: When a construction worker (Michael Keaton) finds the pressures of work and home all getting too much, he decides upon a novel solution: cloning. It's only when there are three versions of himself causing more mayhem than actually doing work that he realises he's got an even bigger problem on his hands. Andie MacDowell co-stars as his unsuspecting wife

programme.title: How to Kill Your Neighbor's Dog
programme.desc: Kenneth Branagh stars as Peter McGowan, a critically acclaimed playwright whose last few works haven't done well. His life is made even more difficult by trying to fix his latest production, a wife who desperately wants kids (Robin Wright Penn), and a neighbor's barking dog that keeps him up at night. He needs a believable child character for his latest work and he realizes he knows nothing about kids. He decides to use his new next door neighbor's daughter Amy as a role model. As he gets to know her better, their lives become increasingly intertwined(n)

programme.title: The Freshman
programme.desc: Romantic screwball comedy about a naive college student who lands the job of a lifetime, only to find he's working for the underworld. The boy likes the money, the great car and the chance for a romantic liaison with the boss's beautiful daughter, but the work seems a little bit shady, and his boss turns out to be an ageing Mafia don - portrayed by Marlon Brando(n)

programme.title: Intolerable Cruelty
programme.desc: Comic drama. The ex-wife of a wealthy philanderer seeks revenge upon the divorce lawyer who represented her husband and denied her a financial settlement. Her schemes become increasingly elaborate, and a battle of the sexes develops(n)

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: A fascinating glimpse into the origin of the Buffy legend. She's come a long way, but here's where her world began!(n)

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: Accomplished mall security guard Paul Blart discovers a heist plot while attending an expo in Las Vegas. His investigative prowess is needed to foil the robbery and arrest those responsible(n)

programme.title: How to Kill Your Neighbor's Dog (?)
Leprechaun in the Hood
programme.desc: Everyone's favorite bloodthirsty Irish gnome invades the world of hip-hop in the fifth film in the Leprechaun series. Stray Bullet, Butch, and Postmaster P are three young rappers trying to raise money for their first record. They break into the studio of powerful producer Mack Daddy (Ice-T), hoping to steal something salable or do some recording. Instead, they discover the secret behind Mack Daddy's multi-platinum success: a magic flute. The rappers take the flute with them, and their careers take a dramatic upswing; but Mack Daddy wants the flute back, and he has reinforcements: the Leprechaun (Warwick Davis), who has an agreement with Mack Daddy and isn't happy when people cross him. Leprechaun in the Hood was directed by Brian Trenchard-Smith, who also directed the third and fourth Leprechaun films(n)

programme.title: Leprechaun: Back 2 tha Hood
programme.desc: When a group of city kids happen across a treasure chest full of gold coins, the short, green guy shows up once again to reclaim what is rightfully his--but not before dispatching with a few of the youths in creative ways and busting out a few rhymes(n)

programme.title: The Choirboys
programme.desc: Loosely based on former policeman Joseph Wambaugh's humorous novel, The Choirboys determinedly explores the stunted interior lives of a large crew of callous, bigoted L.A. policemen. These men get together to lend one another emotional support. However, the means they choose for this do not enhance their sensitivity or their judgement. When one of them has a really bad day, he asks his buddies to come to "choir practice," and they get together for alcoholic benders of fairly epic proportions. When one of them accidentally shoots a homosexual teen cruising a city park, everyone (including higher-ups) gets called on to help with the cover-up. The Choirboys, which was a critical and box-office failure, had an impressive cast list, including such well-known performers as Blair Brown, James Woods, Randy Quaid, Lou Gossett Jr., Perry King and Charles Durning(n)

programme.title: Hustlers Convention
programme.desc: A look at the history of Hustlers Convention, an early influential rap album released in 1973 by Lightnin' Rod(n)

programme.title: Fly Away Home
programme.desc: Uplifting family drama starring Anna Paquin, who won an Oscar for The Piano, as 13-year-old Amy Alden, who is reunited with her father after nine years when her mother is killed in a car accident. Thomas Alden (Jeff Daniels) is keen to rebuild his relationship with Amy, but Amy finds it hard to adjust, especially to Thomas' girlfriend Susan (Dana Delany), and ploughs her energies into looking after a set of abandoned goose eggs which she has brought home to hatch. Thomas watches as Amy cares for the new-born geese and then, when it becomes clear that they must be taught to migrate south for the winter, he builds an amazing flying machine on which he and Amy will fly, leading the geese to warmer climes before the dangerous onset of winter(n)

programme.title: Tin Cup
programme.desc: Golfing drama about a washed-up old pro who tries to get back into the big time. Roy 'Tin Cup' McAvoy (Kevin Costner) ruined his career when he took a risk on the golf course which led to his disqualification from the game. Now he teaches golf to others at a driving range in Salome, Texas, with the help of his trusted friend Romeo Posar (Cheech Marin). But McAvoy's life starts to change when a new student walks into the training centre - Dr Molly Griswold (Rene Russo), who just happens to be dating PGA star David Simms (Don Johnson). To win Molly, 'Tin Cup' knows that he must impress her - and what better way than by beating Simms and winning the US Open? The problem, of course, is that 'Tin Cup' has been teaching golf for so long that he may have forgotten how to play!(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Unification, Part I. First of a two-part story. Picard and Data are assigned to investigate why Spock has undertaken an unauthorised mission

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Unification, Part II. Part two of two. Picard learns of Spock's mission to Romulus and the plan to reunify its people with the Vulcans, but there's more to the ageing ambassador's scheme than meets the eye

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Rightful Heir. A legendary Klingon warrior (Kevin Conway) returns to challenge Worf and threaten the stability of the High Council. Koroth: Alan Oppenheimer. Gowron: Robert O'Reilly. Torin: Norman Snow. Worf: Michael Dorn. Picard: Patrick Stewart. Crusher: Gates McFadden

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Second Chances. LeVar Burton doubled as co-star and director of this episode, which originally aired on May 29, 1993. Returning to the site of a transport accident which occured eight years earlier, Riker comes face to face with an exact double of himself. Living alone for those many years, the "early" Riker still harbors a love for Deanna Troi. As Geordi tries to solve the mystery of the twin Rikers, the "later" Riker tries to reconcile his present feelings for Troi with the ardor expressed by his alter ego. "Second Chances" was written by Rene A. Echavarria, from a story by Michael A. Medlock

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Timescape. When the Enterprise is frozen in time, Picard, Data and Troi have to free their ship without dooming it to destruction by a Romulan warbird, which is frozen in the process of firing its disruptor beam at the Enterprise

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Descent, Part I. The new U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew boldly go where no man has gone before. The Borg return to battle the Federation and tempt Data by helping him feel his first emotion

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Descent Part II. The new U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew boldly go where no man has gone before. Data joins his evil brother Lore to lead The Borg and holds Picard, Troi and Geordi prisoner

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Liaisons. The new U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew boldly go where no man has gone before. Picard ends up stranded on a barren planet with a woman who falls desperately in love with him

programme.title: Goodfellas
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese directs this hard-hitting, highly-acclaimed contemporary gangster drama, based on the memoirs of a real-life Mafia 'wise guy'. Set on the streets of New York, the film follows the rise through the ranks of organised crime of Henry Hill, a small-time hustler who enters the sprawling crime organisation as a runner for neighbourhood don Paul Sorvino. Moving through the mob milieu, Hill comes into contact with veteran Irish hood Robert De Niro, who takes the youngster under his wing to teach him the unwritten rules of the underworld and impress upon him the value of loyalty to the members of his surrogate 'family'

programme.title: Goodfellas

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Descent, Part I. As had been the case on four previous occasions, Next Generation ended its sixth season with the first half of a two-part cliffhanger. First telecast June 26, 1993, part one of "Descent" finds the Borg returning for another duel with the Federation. This time, the Borg boasts a new and very hostile "individuality," and this revelation causes Data to experience his very first emotion. As the episode draws to a close, it looks as if Data, now under the spell of his evil Borg brother Lore, has crossed over to the other side, snarling "The sons of Soong have joined together, and together we will destroy the Federation!" Could there have been any doubt at this point that the loyal Next Generation fans would not return on September 25, 1993, to witness the outcome of this pulse-pounder? Scripted by Ronald D. More from a story by Jeri Taylor, part one of "Descent" boasted the extra added attraction of having several famous scientists, including Isaac Newton and Albert Einstein, appearing in "cameo roles," with one of these notables, physicist Stephen Hawking, playing himself(n)
